Cook a Light Ration at Urda's Campfire

quests.description: Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Report back to Aelstrom and Urda's camp when you're done.
task_desc_texts: Search for Survivors at the wreck of the Pride of Crato
Destroy the Corrupted Growths to help Grace O'Malley
Follow Grace O'Malley\nto a Safe Location

Destroy the Corrupted Growths to help Grace O'Malley
Follow Grace O'Malley\nto a Safe Location

quests.title: Memories of Grace
quests.description: Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Return to the Watchtower when you're done.
task_desc_texts: Search the wreck of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/shipwreck_tendrils.webp::name=The Satisfaction::tid=40141}} to recover Grace's items

Return to Aelstrom and Urda's campsite

From the wreck of The Satisfaction:
Return to Aelstrom and Urda's campsite

quests.title: Team Effort
quests.description: Talk to Grace O'Malley and then meet Aelstrom near the entrance to the sea caves.
task_desc_texts: Join Aelstrom near the entrance\nto the Sea Caves

quests.title: Team Effort
quests.description: Talk to Grace O'Malley and then meet Aelstrom near the entrance to the sea caves.
task_desc_texts: Join Aelstrom near the entrance\nto the Sea Caves

quests.title: Demon Storm
quests.description: Search the Sea Caves and destroy anything that might be the source of the Corruption Storm. Report back to Aelstrom at the Campsite when you're done.
task_desc_texts: Enter the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cave.webp::name=Old Tidal Cave::tid=40146}} and Search for the Source of the Corruption
Search for the Source of the Corruption
Return to Aelstrom and Urda's campsite

quests.title: Demon Storm
quests.description: Search the Sea Caves and destroy anything that might be the source of the Corruption Storm. Report back to Aelstrom at the Campsite when you're done.
task_desc_texts: Enter the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cave.webp::name=Hideaway Caverns::tid=30122}} and Search for the Source of the Corruption
Search for the Source of the Corruption
Return to Aelstrom and Urda's campsite

quests.title: Bearer of Bad Tidings
quests.description: Travel to the town of Corinth and warn the town about the Corrupted.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Corinth to warn the town about the Corrupted

quests.title: Bearer of Bad Tidings
quests.description: Travel to the town of Prydwen and warn the town about the Corrupted.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Prydwen to warn the town about the Corrupted

quests.title: Feast to Famine
quests.description: Speak with the Elder Saatvik Agrawal to find out if you're welcome in Corinth.
task_desc_texts: Speak with Francis Turner, Speaker of the Winds

quests.title: Rest Assured
quests.description: Visit the Inn and speak with Innkeep Verildis Jannsen to check in. Discover an old friend at the Inn.
task_desc_texts: Check in with the Innkeep at the Southern Breeze Inn

quests.title: Money Talks
quests.description: Visit the Trading Post and one of the Storage Sheds in Corinth. Then speak with Grace at the Inn.
task_desc_texts: Meet Grace O'Malley in the tavern
Speak with Francis Turner, Speaker of the Winds

quests.title: Desperate Measures
quests.description: Visit Golden Fields to gather food to resupply Corinth.
task_desc_texts: Talk to Saatvik Agrawal at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Golden Fields::tid=40102}}
Fill the Cart with Grain and Vegetables

quests.title: Firsthand Accounts
quests.description: Rescue and talk to farmers who survived what happened at Golden Fields.

quests.title: Tracking the Tribute
quests.description: Visit the Iron Rose Garrison and find out what happened to the Sorceress Medea's Tribute.
task_desc_texts: Search for Clues to the Missing Tribute at the Iron Rose Garrison

quests.title: Iron and Blood
quests.description: Rescue any surviving members of the Company of the Iron Rose and discover the fate of Sergeant Cotheran, then meet Leovix Silva at the Iron Keep.
task_desc_texts: Establish a Camp near the Iron Rose Garrison
Make a camp or bind to an existing camp to set a respawn point near the Iron Rose Garrison

quests.title: Commander's Correspondence
quests.description: Search Iron Keep to find any information about the missing tribute to Medea. Bring anything you find back to Leovix at the tavern in Corinth.
task_desc_texts: Search Iron Keep for Clues to the Missing Tribute

quests.title: The Missing Tribute
quests.description: Find out what really happened to the tribute to Medea by talking to the Speaker of the Winds and the Captain of the Guard.
task_desc_texts: Confront Speaker of the Winds Francis Turner with Medea's letter
Speak with Captain Marcel Dupont about Medea's Tribute

quests.title: The Pirate Problem
quests.description: Travel to the camp site by Buccaneer Creek. Talk to Grace. Then look for Pirate Treasures at Buccaneer Creek.
task_desc_texts: Scout out the Buccaneer Creek Pirate Camp
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/hero_shipwreck.webp::name=Buccaneer Creek::tid=40158}} for Clues to the Stolen Tribute
Smash Crates to collect Consumed Tribute Supplies
Open the cage to rescue Nessa

quests.title: Web of Lies
quests.description: Find evidence that Marcel was here with the pirates. Recover the stolen Verdant Gemstone.
task_desc_texts: Search captain Dauti's Redoubt for the "Verdant Gemstone"
Meet with Nessa near the Ruins

quests.title: Verdant Restoration
quests.description: Climb Mirador Shrine, complete the ancient puzzle, restore the gemstone, then speak with Nessa.
task_desc_texts: Face the Ancient Guardians at Mirador to restore the Verdant Gemstone
Rotate the Glyphs to restore power to the Mirador Shrine
Speak with Nessa in the Corinth Tavern

quests.title: Hidden Power
quests.description: Explore the Oracle Therismos to find the Ancient Map leading to the other Verdant Gemstones.
task_desc_texts: Explore {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_buttress.webp::name=Oracle Therismos::tid=40120}} to find an Ancient Map
Ascend the Ruins to find the Shrine Map
Obtain a rubbing of the map

quests.title: The Speaker's Crimes
quests.description: Join Saatvik and Leovix in the Town Hall to confront the Speaker of the Winds with proof of his crimes.
task_desc_texts: Join Saatvik and Leovix to confront the Speaker of the Winds
Collect the Verdant Gemstone from the Speaker's Chest

quests.title: Verdant Connections
quests.description: Return the Verdant Gemstone to Eldergate by climbing to the top of the ruins.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_sm.webp::name=Shrine of Kochab::tid=40177}} with the Verdant Gemstone
Ascend the Ruins to replace the Verdant Gemstone

quests.title: Jewel of the Sea
quests.description: Talk to Nessa near the Pirate Den known as Hecker's Haven. Then enter the Den and challenge Captain Korrapati to recover the third Verdant Gemstone.
task_desc_texts: Speak with Nessa Harrower outside the Pirate Base
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/hero_shipwreck.webp::name=Captain Korrapati's Hideout::tid=40122}} to find Captain Korrapati
Obtain the Verdant Gemstone from Captain Korrapati's Chest

quests.title: The Spirit Returns
quests.description: Return the third Verdant Gemstone to Sirius and solve the ancient puzzle.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Shrine of Sirius::tid=40123}} with the Verdant Gemstone
Complete puzzle to restore power at Sirius

quests.title: The Path of Thorns
quests.description: Infiltrate Thornhall, the most holy site of Windsward's druids, and find Medea. Convince her to give the region a second chance.
task_desc_texts: Confront Medea in the Fallen Druid Grove at Thornhall

quests.title: Old Man by the River
quests.description: Travel north to Fisherman's Bend to find the Old Man that Medea believes can help expel the Corruption from your mind.
task_desc_texts: Seek out the Old Hermit\nfishing on the East River

quests.title: The Invasion of Artemis
quests.description: Morgaine requests your assistance to battle the Ancient Huntress Artemis and the Angry Earth in Elysian Wilds. Collect seeds for an inoculate to enter and then work with the rangers and druids of the region to assess the enemy.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Jupiter's Grove::tid=30310}} for seeds for Morgaine’s inoculate
Collect Verdant Seeds from Angry Earth
Travel to the Southern Border of Monarch's Bluff and enter Elysian Wilds
(Optional) Teleport to Wild’s Gateway Spirit Shrine
Travel to the Last Light Encampment

quests.title: Into the Wilds
quests.description: Morgaine requests that you travel west in search of survivors and Hargest's rangers. Help whoever you can, bring back any survivors, and if possible find a means to investigate the horrors beyond the inner bramble walls.
rewards: Infused Angry Earth Ward Potion x10
task_desc_texts: Search the hovels in Forellac for the person spotted by the scouts
Return the pages to Sylvia Oakes
Travel to the location mentioned by Hye-Jin Yoon
Burst Vile Pods to save the rangers
Assess Enemies in the Garden below
Return to the Last Light Encampment
Join Morgaine to peer into Oakes's mind

quests.title: Into the Darkness
quests.description: Morgaine once again needs our assistance breaking through into the lowland jungles for Captain Hargest, so that we can investigate the destroyed settlement of First Light. Help Hargest and her rangers make it down safely.
task_desc_texts: Plant the Reekpods to Repel the Gorillas
Search for the wagon Hargest described
Create a Large Signal Fire for the Rangers
Rejoin Captain Hargest to establish a secure location

quests.title: Survivalist's Revenge
quests.description: Hargest thinks we should investigate Dayspring Mills on our way to the settlement, and evidence suggests that Albert Riches may be fighting back. Travel into the overgrown village and search for whatever clues you can find.
task_desc_texts: Search Dayspring Mills for Survivalist Riches

quests.title: First Light, Last Stand
quests.description: Albert Riches needs reinforcements! Travel northwest to Tanglesnap Hollows where Taurus disposed a chunk of the spirit shrine, destabilizing its effectiveness. It may be a longshot, but forage for ingredients to repair the shrine and correct its power to allow our allies safe passage.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Tanglesnap Hollows to search for pitch ingredients
Collect Fatty Glands from the Hollow Rats
Collect Mulchy Innards from Hollow Corvids
Craft Pitch at an Arcane Repository or Camp
Place fragment on the Spirit Shrine
Nail planks to reinforce first window
Nail planks to reinforce second window

quests.title: Abducted Artificer
quests.description: Survivalist Riches implores us for aid, saving his kidnapped friend Jihoon Kim. Kim was captured by Medusa in the initial invasion, but Riches recently spotted him being dragged east to Saircor, go rescue the Artificer if you can.
task_desc_texts: Examine a note dropped along the road
Find another note dropped by Jihoon Kim
Read another note dropped by Jihoon Kim
Search the ruins for Angry Earth captives
Destroy the bars on Jihoon Kim's Cell

quests.title: Escaping The Ruins
quests.description: Jihoon Kim believes Medusa and Artemis stole an item of importance and stashed it at Portico Tideswallow. If the item is recovered, it may convince the Minotaur there is something sinister going on with Artemis and the Beast Lords.
task_desc_texts: Find a way into Tideswallow to recover what Medusa stole

quests.title: Maze and the Minotaur
quests.description: Kim asks that we boldly brave the Labyrinth of the minotaur Taurus, Northeast of the Ancient ruins, so that we may speak to him. Survive the deadly challenges within, and parley with the beastman if you can.

quests.title: Lord of the Pride
quests.description: To forge an alliance with the Beast Lords we will first need to prove ourselves to them. Taurus suggests that we begin with the Lion Lord Shirzad to the north in Shirzad's Pride. Complete his challenge and gain an audience.
task_desc_texts: Speak with Shirzad the Lion Lord

quests.title: The Proving Grounds
quests.description: Shirzad has listened to our plea and is willing to entertain our propositions for now. Travel west to Kurok's Anchorage and speak with the Gorilla Lord Kurok. Deliver Shirzad's message and gain an audience with the Lord.
task_desc_texts: Speak to the Gorilla Lord Kurok
Defeat Patriarch Subzuru in the Crafted Place
Defeat Patriarch Keelua in the Deep Below
Defeat Patriarch Furuga by the Water's Edge

quests.title: Rage of the Mammoth
quests.description: Kurok has accepted our bid of peace for now, and is willing to reconvene with Shirzad over their fate on Aeternum. He now worries for his kin Mahantaram, the final Lord. Head east to the Trampled Lands, and face the mammoth.

quests.title: Garden of the Gorgon
quests.description: Morgaine entreats us to retrieve the Tear of Gaea at all costs, but first we must defeat Medusa. Taurus already makes his way to her vile gardens south west of the ranger camp. Slay the Gorgon and drive her from these lands.
task_desc_texts: Enter the Arena and Face Medusa

quests.title: Arcana Aligned
quests.description: Trahern and Morgaine believe they may have devised a means of capturing Artemis and securing the Tear. Meet Morgaine up the road in the high mountains of what is now Scalefang Enclave to see what magic she has in mind.
task_desc_texts: Place Your Azoth Staff in the Light

quests.title: One With Nature
quests.description: Morgaine directs us upward to the bloom above. With our Azoth Staff now empowered by the arcane energies channeled from Elafry Pyrgo we have but one more component to secure. Fight with Trahern, claim it, and finish the spell.
task_desc_texts: Scout Out the Elafry Pyrgo Tower
Place Your Staff in the Circle

quests.title: The End of New Eden
quests.description: Morgaine puts forth her final plea - capture Artemis and secure the Tear of Gaea from her grasp. With your allies at your back, ascend Elafry Pyrgo and battle the Ancient Artemis for the fate of the region, Aeternum, and the World.
task_desc_texts: Ascend the Tower and stop Artemis before it's too late
Reach the pinnacle of Elafry Pyrgo
Confront Artemis and disrupt her horrifying plans
Give the Tear of Gaea to Morgaine
Return to the Last Light Encampment
Speak with your companions and allies

quests.title: Welcome to Cutlass
quests.description: The ever magnanimous Patricia Reid wishes to welcome you to Spyglass Ridge and Cutlass Keys. Do her a favor, and speak to some of her friends, will ya?
task_desc_texts: Speak with James Oxen in the Tavern
Speak with First Mate Grimm in the Tavern

quests.title: Pirate's Life For Me
quests.description: First Mate Grimm waits eagerly in the tavern to tell the tale of the cursed doubloons to any and all newcomers. Hear his words and listen well.
task_desc_texts: Take a Seat and Listen to Grimm's Pirate Tale

quests.title: It Crawls Beneath Us
quests.description: James Oxen is seeking a cure for the curse that turned his crew to stone. Speak to Glendyn Trahern in southeastern Cutlass Keys for answers.
task_desc_texts: Follow Oxen's Directions southeast to Gorgon's Landing

quests.title: Flesh From Stone (Expedition)
quests.description: The Broodmother Medusa has turned Oxen's crew to stone and is spawning hordes of Hercyne to claim Aeternum. Gather ingredients for the antidote and defeat her.
task_desc_texts: Collect Hyacinth Flowers from Echoing Vale
Collect Kithos Blossom from the Baths
Collect Gorgon's Bane from The Precipice

quests.title: Welcome to Prydwen
quests.description: Check in at the Regent's Rise Inn, and keep an eye out for the pirate captain from the beach, Grace O'Malley.
task_desc_texts: Check in at the Regent's Rise Inn

quests.title: Friends with Coin
quests.description: Grace O'Malley has given you the coin she owes you. Look for bargains at the Trading Post and store the excess at the Storage Shed.
task_desc_texts: Check out the local Storage Shed
Meet Grace O'Malley in the tavern

quests.title: The Knight-Regent
quests.description: Grace O'Malley says a messenger came from the Knight-Regent who's requested you come see her at the keep.
task_desc_texts: Meet with Knight-Regent Jin Jae at the Prydwen Keep

quests.title: Foreman's Fate
quests.description: Knight-Regent Jin Jae, knight in charge of Monarch's Bluffs, has asked you to help Allya Musa at Cynefin Mines.
task_desc_texts: Speak to Minister Lochnir before venturing to Cynefin Mine
Check on Cynefin Mine for Knight-Regent Jin Jae

quests.title: Crisis at the Mines
quests.description: A worried Allya Musa wants you to rescue any surviving miners at Cynefin Mine.

quests.title: A Most Mysterious Tablet
quests.description: Elias Derit believes a strange magical tablet is causing the trouble at the mines. Destroy the tablet and the Lost Pirates who guard it.
task_desc_texts: Look for the strange Tablet at Hiraeth Peak
Hint: Might need to Blast your way into the mine
Destroy the Mysterious Tablet and Collect Fragments

quests.title: Fragments of Truth
quests.description: Elias Derit wants you to take back news of Hiraeth Peak to Knight-Regent Jin Jae at Prydwen.
task_desc_texts: Return to the Knight-Regent to Report the Disaster at Cynefin Mine

quests.title: Source of the Plague
quests.description: Knight-Regent Jin Jae asks you to bring the recovered tablet fragments to Sage Moira so she can study them for answers and to ask Minister Lochnir about the reports from the mine.
task_desc_texts: Speak to Sage Moira about the tablet fragments
Ask Minister Lochnir about the missives from Cynefin Mine

quests.title: Knight in the North
quests.description: Knight-Regent Jin Jae is beginning to trust you. She's asked you to join Ser Payne Bennett in challenging the Pirates encamped at Brysedd Shore.
task_desc_texts: Join Ser Payne Bennett at Brysedd Shore to Confront the Lost Pirates
Make a camp or bind to an existing camp to set a respawn point

quests.title: Brigands on the Beach
quests.description: Ser Payne has asked you to use unusual methods to fight the filthy Lost pirates. Cut off their supplies and set their boats adrift!
task_desc_texts: Assault the Pirates' Supply Lines on the Brysedd Shore
Knock Supply Crates into the water

quests.title: A Pirate's Plan
quests.description: Grace O'Malley knows what's summoning the Lost. Go into the Pirates' den and destroy the evil altar.
task_desc_texts: Talk to Grace O’Malley at Corsair's Rise
Venture into Traitor’s Hold to Find and Destroy the Altar Grace witnessed
Collect Fragments from the Shattered Altar

quests.title: Report to Prydwen
quests.description: Ser Payne Bennett has asked you to use the Spirit Shrine to get to Prydwen quickly and warn the Regent about the Lost Pirates.
task_desc_texts: Use the Spirit Shrine at Corsair's Rise to return to Prydwen
Bring news of the Lost Pirates to Knight-Regent Jin Jae

quests.title: Relics of the Ancients
quests.description: Regent Jin Jae has asked you to work with Sage Moira to determine if there is any connection between the tablet from the mine and the altar in the pirate's den.
task_desc_texts: Speak to Sage Moira about the tablet fragments
Investigate the ruins of Khalladan as advised by Sage Moira
(Optional) Fast Travel to Khalladan from a Spirit Shrine

quests.title: The Mystery of Minister Lochnir
quests.description: Moira now believes the Ancient tablet was taken from the ruins of Antares. She's asking you to search for any clues relating to the tablet, the Lost, or Minister Lochnir.
task_desc_texts: Search Antares for Clues to the Tablet's origins
Find where the Tablet came from

quests.title: The True Threat
quests.description: Grace O'Malley has asked you to share the truth about Lochnir with the Knight-Regent at Preiddeu Farms.
task_desc_texts: Join Knight-Regent Jin Jae at Preiddeu Farms
Tell Knight-Regent Jin Jae about Lochnir's Studies

quests.title: Broken Oath
quests.description: The former knight Percilla Wallen suggests you investigate Teyrnon Keep to learn more about the return of the true heir, Ser Gawain.
task_desc_texts: Enter the Main Hall in Teyrnon Keep
Search for Clues to what happened here
Return to Percilla's Farm to Confront her with the Truth

quests.title: Kingdom of the Lost
quests.description: Percilla Wallen has advised you meet Grace and stay informed of her latest findings at Deadman's Shrine.
task_desc_texts: Look for Grace O’Malley in the Southern Bluffs

quests.title: The Plot against Prydwen
quests.description: Stop the Lost fleet from leaving Scallywag Bay. Start with their explosives and then destroy their altar.
task_desc_texts: Sabotage the Pirates' Operation in Southern Bluffs Bay
Report back on the sabotage of the Pirates' assault preparations

quests.title: Corbenic Castle
quests.description: Percilla Wallen suspects Ser Gawain, the True Heir and Lochnir, the scheming minister, have gone to Corbenic Castle. Meet her there.
task_desc_texts: Rejoin Ser Percilla Wallen at Corbenic Castle

quests.title: Lost Legacy
quests.description: The time of judgement is nigh. Confront Ser Gawain, the True Heir and the pestilent Minister Lochnir at Corbenic Castle.
task_desc_texts: Fight through Corbenic Castle to reach Gawain's Hall

quests.title: A True Leader
quests.description: Ser Gawain and Lochnir have been vanquished. In the absence of the True Heir, find a True Ruler for the crown.
task_desc_texts: Return to Prydwen to Report the Defeat of Ser Gawain

quests.title: Wilderness Wiseman
quests.description: Travel east to Fisherman's Bend to find the Old Man that Jin Jae believes can help expel the Corruption from your mind.
task_desc_texts: Seek out the Mysterious Old Man Fishing on the River

quests.title: Brimstone Under Siege
quests.description: A troubled woman at the Refugee Caravan has warned of an impending attack by the Corrupted Legion, and has asked for your help to defend the civilians.
task_desc_texts: Engage the Legion before they reach the refugee camp
Defeat the waves of Legion attackers

quests.title: The Great Architect
quests.description: Ghazi Laghmani has asked for any possible assistance in finding her teacher, the Great Sage Imhotep, last seen near The Acropolis.
task_desc_texts: Search for any signs of Imhotep
Follow the trail of the discarded Legion equipment
Find the path to climb and reach the journal page
Read the journal entry, 'A Mysterious Threat'

quests.title: Preemptive Strike
quests.description: Ghazi has received word that the Corrupted Legion is preparing an even larger assault on the Caravan. While she heads north to search for Imhotep, she has asked you to attack the Legion directly at their garrison of Crassus's Rise.
task_desc_texts: Strike the Legion at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_legion_hq.webp::name=Crassus's Rise::tid=30306}} to prevent the attack on Wikala al-Waha

quests.title: Stirring in the Sands
quests.description: Imhotep continues to investigate a new threat, heading west toward Carthago. Once found, Ghazi anxiously awaits news of his return at Cavalier's Rest.
task_desc_texts: Search Carthago for any signs of Imhotep
Assault the Lost Bandits in Carthago:
Follow Aban's instructions and continue on toward {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=New Rhacotis::tid=30308}}
Search New Rhacotis for Imhotep's whereabouts
Investigate the temple for signs of Imhotep
Eliminate the threats within New Rhacotis
Follow the northern road out of New Rhacotis
Survive the ambush by the Angry Earth
Read the journal entry, 'The Malevolence Grows'

quests.title: A Blossoming Threat
quests.description: With the ambush by the Angry Earth, Ghazi is certain they are responsible for Imhotep's disappearance. She knows the Angry Earth have been seen around Jupiter's Grove, and asks again for your continued help in finding Imhotep.\n\nGhazi's scouts have reported that you will need a ranged weapon to complete this task.
task_desc_texts: Search for Imhotep among the Angry Earth in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Jupiter's Grove::tid=30310}} [Ranged Weapon Required]
Search for the captive Imhotep in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Jupiter's Grove::tid=30310}}

Defeat {{VC::name=Amishah of the Dunes::qty=1::named=0::id=Sand_Elemental_Shaman_Named_00::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Sand_Elemental_Shaman_Named_00}} and collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/sandt4.webp::name=Animated Sands::drop=100%::rarity=common}} to free Imhotep
Return to Imhotep and free him
Destroy the exposed nodules of the driftwood cage with a ranged weapon
Seek out Ghazi and Imhotep in New Corsica

quests.title: Past Prologue
quests.description: While Imhotep recuperates from his recent tribulations, Ghazi has suggested you read Imhotep's 'Legacy of the Ancients' and learn of the impact the Ancients had on Brimstone Sands.
task_desc_texts: Read the tome, 'Legacy of the Ancients'

quests.title: Watering the Seed
quests.description: Recovered from his kidnapping, the Great Sage Imhotep has told you of the strange seed carried north by the Angry Earth, likely to the Oasis Spontanea. He and Ghazi will await you at the Great Shrine of Thoth.
task_desc_texts: Investigate the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/desert_oasis.webp::name=Oasis Spontanea::tid=30401}} for clues to the Angry Earth
Search the ruins for signs of the Angry Earth
Destroy the Angry Earth Power Sources:

quests.title: Unraveling the Mystery
quests.description: Unable to breach the magic of the Ancient focus, Imhotep knows of a powerful spell which may provide answers. Relics from Aqua Anuket, Arit-en-Geb, and Anhur's Pride should empower his magic enough to succeed.
task_desc_texts: Collect the Artifacts for Imhotep's Ritual:
Climb to the top of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_lg.webp::name=Aqua Anuket::tid=30427}} and search for a Canopic Jar

Ascend to the top of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_lg.webp::name=Aqua Anuket::tid=30427}} to find the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/housingitem/house_housingitem_entitlement_egyptian2022_canopicjar01.webp::name=Uraeus Canopic Jar::drop=100%::rarity=common}}
Explore {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ore.webp::name=Anhur's Pride::tid=30402}} and search for a Canopic Jar

Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/housingitem/house_housingitem_entitlement_egyptian2022_canopicjar02.webp::name=Horus Canopic Jar::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ore.webp::name=Anhur's Pride::tid=30402}}
Search the Ruins at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_sm.webp::name=Arit-en-Geb::tid=30408}} for an Ancient Key
Unlock the Sealed Coffer to Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/holdingrunet5.webp::name=Ancient Seal::drop=100%::rarity=common}}
Place the Uraeus Jar for the ritual
Place the Horus Jar for the ritual
Place the Ancient Seal for the ritual
Step away and allow Imhotep to begin the Ritual

quests.title: Accursed Apophis
quests.description: Apophis's remarks have Imhotep worried about a grander machination involving Ancient technology. He suggests investigating an undisturbed Ancient vault in Hermopolis, where Apophis may have found materials for his plans, while he and Ghazi return to New Corsica.
task_desc_texts: Search the ruins of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_gate.webp::name=Hermopolis::tid=30403}} for the Entrance to the Ancient Vault
Investigate the Ancient architecture for the Entrance to the Ancient Vault
Continue searching for any clues about the Ancient Vault
Input the correct glyph sequence, then use the Actuator
Use the Platform to access the Ancient Vault
Search the Vault for evidence of Apophis's greater plan

Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/housingitem/house_housingitem_entitlement_egyptian2022_wall_scrolls01.webp::name=Ancient Scrolls::drop=100%::rarity=common}} for Imhotep to translate
Meet Ghazi and Imhotep at the Library in New Corsica

quests.title: The Demon's Cauldron
quests.description: Imhotep's translation speaks of a method to merge two beings together, a practice thought long lost. The sulfurous jar indicates a visit to the Pools of Orcus to the west, and he asks your help in searching for clues to Apophis's plans.
task_desc_texts: Seek out the source of the sulfurous fluid in the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/sulfer_pools.webp::name=Pools of Orcus::tid=20307}}
Search for clues near the bubbling pools
Continue searching the pools for anything out of place
Search the remaining pools for any evidence of Apophis' involvement
Use the Azoth Staff to drain the barrier's energy

Collect an {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_roughstoneglowingrunes.webp::name=Ancient Device Fragment::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the rubble
Return to the Library to report on your findings

quests.title: Power of the Ancients
quests.description: Imhotep is intimately familiar with the fragment of the Ancient power source, having designed the Pyramid of Akhet to house it. He suggests searching near Diospolis for an entry point to the pyramid's interior, the origin of the fragment.
task_desc_texts: Search for the Diospolis entrance to the Pyramid of Akhet
Defeat the {{VC::name=Anubian_Scarab_Named_01::qty=1::named=0::id=::url=}} in the depths of the Pyramid
Climb the broken staircase to the upper level of the Pyramid
Search for the disturbance on the upper terrace
Use Your Azoth Staff to unseal the Glyph

quests.title: Scourge of Aeon Madness
quests.description: Adiana's revelation at the pyramid has caused Imhotep's Aeon Madness to assert itself, and Ghazi has asked for help in gathering local herbs needed to treat the Great Sage. She will attempt to calm Imhotep while you prepare the recipe.
task_desc_texts: Gather the ingredients to create Imhotep's Remedy
Gather {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/consumable/cactusflesht1.webp::name=Cactus Flesh::drop=::rarity=common}} from Cacti throughout Brimstone Sands

Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/strdexbonust4.webp::name=Alligator Teeth::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from {{VC::name=Lycopolysian Alligator::qty=2::named=0::id=Alligator_Black_16BS05::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Alligator_Black_16BS05}}s north of New Corsica

Search chests in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_sm.webp::name=Stairs of Tefenet::tid=20412}} for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/focdexbonust1.webp::name=Aqua Bittern::drop=100%::rarity=common}}
Craft Imhotep's Remedy at an Arcane Repository or Campsite

quests.title: The Eye of Horus
quests.description: Ghazi's concern at Imhotep's flight is evident, and she begs your assistance in chasing him down. He ran toward the Gates of Sutekh, ranting about the Eye of Horus and the return of the gods.
task_desc_texts: Follow Imhotep to the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Gates of Sutekh::tid=20415}}
Investigate the strange energy source on the wall
Adjust the position of the projector
Rotate the reflectors to project the beam of Azoth forward
Investigate the building indicated by the beam
Pass through the Ancient Glyph door and explore the sealed chamber

quests.title: Challenging the Pharaoh
quests.description: The Eye of Horus has been taken, but droplets of quintessence form a path to follow. Imhotep, or perhaps something worse, must be at the end of the trail.
task_desc_texts: Use the Azoth Staff to follow Imhotep's trail
Follow Imhotep into the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Place of Pillars::tid=20416}}
Search for a path up the pillars to reach Imhotep
Ascend the ruins to confront Imhotep
Use the Eye of Horus on the Ancient Code Pillar
Read the journal entry, 'The Book of Gates'

quests.title: A God Awakens
quests.description: With the Eye of Horus in hand, Imhotep has given you the location of the Necropolis of Sutekh, the resting place of an Ancient. Adiana and Apophis must not be allowed to rouse Sutekh from his slumber!
task_desc_texts: Enter the Ordeal of the Nine Gates
Complete the Ordeal of the Nine Gates
Enter the Necropolis of Sutekh and face Apophis
Defeat Apophis and prevent him from awakening Sutekh
Return to Imhotep to report your success
Return to the Library in New Corsica

quests.title: The Wild Huntress
quests.description: With the immediate threat stymied and Imhotep stabilized, he has recalled long forgotten memories about a shrine to Artemis somewhere in the northern reaches of Everfall. Visiting it may provide a clue to Adiana's - Artemis's - next move.
task_desc_texts: Return to the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grovealtar.webp::name=Daughterwell::tid=40204}} and search for answers
Search the area for any hidden markers or shrines to Artemis
Return to the Library in New Corsica to warn Imhotep

quests.title: Secrets of the Heartgem
quests.description: <font color="#b2aea1">HEARTRUNE UNLOCK QUEST</font>\nThe Soulwardens sent Anna Rózsa to learn about an intriguing source of power in Brimstone Sands. Unlock your Heartgem's hidden potential at the Great Wall of Nebet-Het, then meet Scout Rózsa at the Palace of Nekhbet.
task_desc_texts: Travel north to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_shrine.webp::name=Great Wall of Nebet-Het::tid=30426}}
Seek out the entrance to the Wall
Climb the rubble to reach the top of the Wall
Ascend to the highest point of the Wall
Use Your Azoth Staff to unseal the Ancient Glyph
Use the new knowledge to pass through the sealed door
Place your Heartgem on the Scales and be judged

quests.title: Old Stone Remembers
quests.description: Desperate for a way to banish the cruel voice in your head, follow the rambling musings of the old hermit Yonas by seeking the wisdom of old stone carvings.
task_desc_texts: Search the ruins of Chason Steep\nfor clues to Yonas's past
Slash through vines until you find\nthe stones Yonas mentioned
Destroy vines to find the Memorial
Investigate the cave for clues to Yonas's past
Ask Yonas about the Armor Scraps
Continue search for Soulwarden Memorials in the ruins of Alioth
Ascend to the Upper Section\nof the Ruins of Alioth
Destroy vines to find the final Memorial

quests.title: Strength of a Soul
quests.description: To Learn more about the Soulwardens, face the Wardens' trials in the Tomb of the Old Warrior.
task_desc_texts: Enter the Tomb of the Old Warrior
Complete the Trial to Unlock the Sealed Door
Look for Yonas back on the Road

quests.title: Talk of the Town
quests.description: Yonas appears to have left you at the ruins, but luckily Grace O'Malley saw him pass by toward the town of Oxboro. Ask around to see if anyone has seen where he went off to.
task_desc_texts: Ask about Yonas in the town of Oxboro
Ask the Oxboro Guardsman about Yonas
Ask the Oxboro Constable about Yonas
Look for Yonas's Fishing Hut east of Oxboro

quests.title: The Last Soulwarden
quests.description: Seek answers about the Soulwardens' fate within the tower Arcturus.
task_desc_texts: Search Arcturus for clues about the Soulwardens' fate
Find the Soulwarden Clue in the base of the Tower
Climb to the next level of the Tower
Find the Soulwarden Clue in heart of the Tower
Defeat the spirits of fallen Soulwardens
Find the final Soulwarden Clue at top of the Tower

quests.title: Speaker of the Angry Earth
quests.description: Yonas Alazar says that if you want to become a Soulwarden, you'll need a living seed from the Angry Earth. Yonas recalls a woman in the wildnerness, elusive as a shadow, that may be able to help you acquire such a thing, if you can find her.
task_desc_texts: Return to Oxboro and ask around town about the Huntress
Ask Grace O'Malley about the Huntress
Ask Captain Dubois about the Huntress
Seek out the Huntress in northern Everfall

quests.title: The Daughterwell
quests.description: Explore the Canary Mine and purge any Corrupted manifestations might be blocking the flow of Azoth to Adiana's fountain in the Daughterwell.
task_desc_texts: Investigate {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Canary Mine::tid=40203}} for\nthe cause of the blocked Azoth flow
Destroy sources of Corruption blocking the flow of Azoth
Return to see if your actions unblocked the Fountain

quests.title: Weakness of the Ego
quests.description: Use Adiana's recipe to gather the ingredients to craft a tincture that will dampen the effects of Corruption.
task_desc_texts: Use Adiana's Mortar and Pestle to craft a Corruption Tincture

quests.title: Plans of the Pestilent
quests.description: Adiana Theron suspects the Corrupted of Ebonrock Armory are looking for something. Thin their forces and determine their purpose there.
task_desc_texts: Scout Ebonrock Armory for the source of the incursion

quests.title: A Living Conduit
quests.description: Adiana Theron has seen fit to grant you a seed of power, a fitting conduit for the weapon of a Soulwarden. Return to Yonas Alazar with news of your success.

quests.title: The Implement of a Soulwarden
quests.description: In search of the haft for your Azoth Staff, Yonas indicates the existence a hidden, secret cache within the hidden interior of Canis.
task_desc_texts: Search for a hidden cache beneath the obelisk Canis
Use the teleporter to enter Canis
Acquire the haft for your Azoth Staff

quests.title: Forgemaster's Legacy
quests.description: Search the Ancient ruin of Vulcanus for the materials to craft the Crosspiece of your Azoth Staff.
task_desc_texts: Visit the Ancient Soulwarden forge to find a Warden's Crosspiece
Access the Forge within the ruins of Vulcanus
Defeat Forgemaster Ezra to Collect Crosspiece

quests.title: An Order Reborn
quests.description: With the components of an ancient Soulwarden staff in hand, proceed to the forge beneath Shattered Obelisk. There, you will reignite the flame of the Soulwarden Order by bringing a new Azoth Staff into being.
task_desc_texts: Seek the Sacred Chamber beneath the Shattered Obelisk
Construct your Azoth Staff within the Obelisk

quests.title: The Defense of Everfall
quests.description: Deliver news of hope to the people of Everfall. The staff in your hands carries with it the power to destroy Corruption at its roots.
task_desc_texts: Rally Oxboro to help fight the Corrupted
Meet Grace O'Malley in the Oxboro Tavern
Ask Constable Maecia to help fight the Corrupted

quests.title: The Invasion of Everfall
quests.description: Though the townsfolk of Everfall refuse to help themselves, you have the means to protect them. Guard Captain Franc Dubois offers moral support for your quest to battle the Corrupted in Northern Everfall. He simply asks you to keep an eye out for Herbalist Howe during your travels.
task_desc_texts: Repel the Corrupted in north Everfall\n(Look for Hapless Howe too)
Repel the Corrupted in north Everfall
Use your Azoth Staff to destroy Corrupted Growths
Find the Corrupted Invaders' source of power
Use your Azoth Staff to clear Colossal Corruption
Return to Oxboro with news of your victory

quests.title: Destiny Unearthed
quests.description: Acquire a Heartgem, meant to shield your soul against the effects of Corruption. Search southern Everfall for rare reagents needed to create a new Heartgem.
task_desc_texts: Search for the Heart of a Guardian in the ruins
Defeat Ancient Guardians to collect the Heart of a Guardian
Search for Icebound Gemstone in the Caves
Use your Azoth Staff to collect the Icebound Gemstone
Collect Azoth Dust from Guardians at the Shattered Obelisk
Defeat Ancient Guardians to collect Azoth Dust
Construct your Heartgem in the Azoth Font

quests.title: The Ritual
quests.description: Complete the ritual deep in Amrine Temple to conquer death and become a Soulwarden in full.
task_desc_texts: Seek out the ritual site within Amrine Temple

quests.title: Darkness in the Brightwood
quests.description: Yonas recalls a priest named Brother Umberto who once ministered to the Soulwardens. The two of you decide to seek out Umberto in the town of Walsham in Brightwood and learn his fate.
task_desc_texts: Meet Yonas near Walsham to begin searching for Brother Umberto
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Walsham::tid=40257}} for clues to Brother Umberto's whereabouts
Trace Brother Umberto's movements through the town

Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_candlestick.webp::name=Blessed Candle::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s left behind by Brother Umberto
Locate the remnants of Brother Umberto's home
Read the lore page, "A Plea to Pastor Prewitt" to uncover what occurred in Walsham
Determine the fate of the town's residents in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/graveyard.webp::name=Walsham's Field::tid=40258}}
Investigate Walsham Church for clues to the fates of Umberto and Prewitt
Read the lore page, "Seeking Salvation" to learn where Umberto went

quests.title: The Shining Knight
quests.description: On the trail of Brother Umberto, you and Yonas have decided to head west, where the priest apparently went to request assistance from the knight, Ser Galahad.
task_desc_texts: Follow Umberto's trail west in search of the legendary knight, Ser Galahad
Investigate {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Tillingast::tid=40262}} for signs of Brother Umberto
Read Umberto's journal entry, "A Grim Springtide"
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Tillingast::tid=40262}} for evidence of the departed Knights
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Deggendorf::tid=40261}} for signs of Brother Umberto or the Bright Vigil

Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/conbonust1.webp::name=Bright Vigil Insignia::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s from {{VC::name=Lost::qty=6::named=0::id=Lost::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Lost}} and containers in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Deggendorf::tid=40261}}
Return to the road and speak with Yonas
Investigate the presence of Corrupted at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cathedral.webp::name=Ballard's Manor::tid=40260}}
Travel north to rendezvous with Ser Galahad

quests.title: Losing the Faith
quests.description: Investigate Staudt's Manor and Kalterstein Cemetery for more clues about Umberto and then meet Galahad and Yonas at the shrine to the north.
task_desc_texts: Search for information about Umberto in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Kalterstein Cemetery::tid=40327}}
Read the notice Umberto posted, "Condemnation of the Staudt Family"
Search for information about Umberto in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Staudt Manor::tid=40264}}
Explore {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Staudt Manor::tid=40264}} and search for any references to the keep, Caer Dun
Meet Yonas and Ser Galahad near Wolfbough Shrine

quests.title: Crimson Menace
quests.description: Yonas has discovered that the Corrupted have claimed several resource locations in Brightwood, including a massive iron mine. You need to investigate if they have an ulterior motive in seizing the mine and then meet Yonas in the town of Calvary.
task_desc_texts: Investigate the Corrupted operation at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Corlew's Mine::tid=40306}}
Investigate the reason behind the Corrupted occupation of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Corlew's Mine::tid=40306}}
Sabotage the Corrupted Azoth mining operation at Corlew's Mine
Destroy the 3 elements of the Azoth Extractor
Destroy the 3 elements of the Azoth Refinery
Travel to the town of {{POI::icon=::name=Calvary::tid=40352}} and report to Yonas
Look for Yonas at the Vigil's Rest Inn in Calvary

quests.title: The Gates of Great Cleave
quests.description: Yonas is scouting out the Corrupted presence in Great Cleave where he has asked that you join him and formulate a strategy for driving the enemy out of Brightwood.
task_desc_texts: Search for Yonas near the Corrupted front at Great Cleave
Investigate the fort of Caer Dun
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/outpost.webp::name=Caer Dun::tid=50392}} for valuables, and return them to Grace
Return to {{POI::icon=::name=Calvary::tid=40352}} to learn about Caer Dun

quests.title: The Vigil’s Truth
quests.description: Galahad has reached an impasse in the investigation into what happened to Umberto and the Bright Vigil. It's decided that you will speak with Mayor Pennyfather and follow up on any hints he's willing to share.
task_desc_texts: Investigate {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Morgenstadt::tid=40310}} to learn what Mayor Pennyfather is hiding
Search for clues at the center of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Morgenstadt::tid=40310}}
Study Grave Markers for clues to Townspeople's fate
Search homes for mementos of the Lost
Offer mementos to the proper gravestones
Read the notice posted by Grand Vigilant Umberto
Follow the clues to discover the fate of those sent to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cathedral.webp::name=Sonnesbruck Cathedral::tid=40328}}
Read Umberto's Orders to the Inquisitors at the Cathedral

quests.title: Betrayal at Brightrest
quests.description: Mayor Tunstall Pennyfather admitted that he was aware of the Bright Vigil's atrocities and the curse that followed. After discussing with Galahad and the Master Alchemist Sun Fuchun, it becomes clear where the trail leads next.
task_desc_texts: Collect Sigils from Lost Vigilants at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Brightrest Cemetery::tid=40253}} as proof they paid for their crimes
Burn the Bright Vigil's unused caskets
(Optional) Search for Vigilant's Sigil in the grave
Read Vigilant Moira's letter, "Dissension in the Ranks"
Meet Ser Galahad at the Pennine Shrine near Weaver's Fen
Bring the Vigilants' Sigils to Sun Fuchun at the Postrehkin Shrine

quests.title: The Azoth Tree
quests.description: In order to cleanse the curse from Caer Dun, Sun Fuchun needs Sacred Waters collected from the Azoth Tree in the nearby grove, but it's necessary to acquire vessels from the Shamans in the neighboring caverns in order to extract the waters. After collecting the waters, rejoin Sun Fuchun.
task_desc_texts: Obtain the vessel used by the Angry Earth in the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cave.webp::name=Lush Hideaway::tid=40248}}
Gather a {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/saget1.webp::name=Purification Herb::drop=100%::rarity=common}} near the entrances to the cave

Defeat {{VC::name=Balanos::qty=1::named=1::id=Dryad_Shaman_Named_00::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Dryad_Shaman_Named_00}} in the cave to collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/lodestonet1.webp::name=Empty Pure Water Root::drop=100%::rarity=common}}
Visit {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=The Azoth Tree::tid=40222}} to collect the Sacred Waters
Approach the well of the Azoth Tree

quests.title: Umberto’s Sentence

task_desc_texts: Hunt down Brother Umberto in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Vigil's Stand::tid=40249}}
Investigate the walled sanctum at the center of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Vigil's Stand::tid=40249}}
Search the nearby homes for keys to the sanctum door's locks
Unlock Sanctum Gate and Enter the Sanctum

Defeat {{VC::name=Brother Umberto, Grand Vigilant::qty=1::named=0::id=Brother_Umberto_Human::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Brother_Umberto_Human}} and retrieve {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/onyxt2.webp::name=Umberto's Heartgem::drop=100%::rarity=common}}
Return and report your success to Galahad

quests.title: The Curse of Caer Dun

Destroy the Heartgem's final seal and release Brother Umberto's soul
Return to the surface with the news of Umberto's defeat
Ask Sun Fuchun if the curse is lifted

quests.title: The Corpse Crone

task_desc_texts: Go to {{POI::icon=::name=Calvary::tid=40352}} and ask Pennyfather about the Corpse Crone
Meet Galahad near the Pennine Shrine

quests.title: The Crone's Curse
quests.description: Find any information pertaining to the whereabouts of the Corpse Crone.
task_desc_texts: Search Periville for any information on the Corpse Crone
Search for information on the Corpse Crone
Search for more journal pages from the Corpse Crone
Follow the trail of the Corpse Crone's victims
Bring the Corpse Crone's journal back to Galahad
Look at the Wanted Poster for the Corpse Crone

quests.title: The Curse of Karburg
quests.description: Discover what the Corpse Crone did to Karburg.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Karburg to find the Corpse Crone
Search for the source of the curse

quests.title: Bridge Into the Past

task_desc_texts: Find a way onto the bridge
Continue to climb up Vega Bridge
Read another journal page of the Corpse Crone
Talk to Grace O'Malley about the bridge

Talk to Grace O'Malley about the empty chest

Ask Bella Ruby about the Corpse Crone

task_desc_texts: Remove any Lost that would power up the devices

quests.title: A Face in the Mist
quests.description: Travel through the barrier at Morgaine's cave, tell her about your vision, and learn about Morgaine's past.

quests.title: Old Wounds
quests.description: Convince Galahad that Morgaine's help is necessary before meeting Morgaine at Canopus.
task_desc_texts: Return to Twillen to speak with Galahad

quests.title: Unexpected Prisoner
quests.description: Explore Andrometus to discover what has been imprisoned there.

Search for Captured Soulwarden Scouts in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Riven Anvil::tid=40308}}

quests.title: Secrets in the Ruins

Collect the {itemname} from the upper fountain

Search Sunderfort for clues about Thorpe's plans

Travel across {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Ostrog Scythe::tid=40315}} to break the Corrupted blockade

quests.title: Mounting An Attack
quests.description: Follow the route of the ore through the mountain road and destroy any Unfinished Portals.

task_desc_texts: Meet with Yonas and the Soulwardens

quests.title: The Untamed Garden
quests.description: After a successful offensive in Great Cleave, the focus now turns to a more permanent solution for Corruption.\nTravel into Edengrove with Sun and Morgaine to search for knowledge, weapons, or allies that may help in the battle ahead.
task_desc_texts: Meet Morgaine at the western border of Edengrove
Search the Varangian camp for a purpose to their presence
Follow Sun down the path into Edengrove
Speak with Sun further down the path into Edengrove

Follow the path of the beacons
Rendezvous with Morgaine and Sun in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/outpost.webp::name=Inishglory Camp::tid=53012}}
Locate Morgaine and Sun in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/outpost.webp::name=Inishglory Camp::tid=53012}}

task_desc_texts: Travel the road through {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grove.webp::name=Ardan Creag::tid=50330}} to get a better view
Search the Ancient Road for signs of Myrddin

Continue searching for signs of Myrddin and acquire more Creag Crystals
Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/amethystt4.webp::name=Creag Crystal Point::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s from the base of the creag
Find Morgaine and deliver the gathered crystals
Use the collected crystals on the overgrown sphere
Follow Myrddin's instructions and catch up with Morgaine

Study the glyphs on the wall

Travel into {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Lough Du Lac::tid=50317}} to gather cuttings from the Angry Earth

Gather {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/stickyvinest1.webp::name=Angry Earth Brambles::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the patrolling {{VC::name=Angry Earth::qty=2::named=0::id=AngryEarth::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/AngryEarth}}
Locate the communing pool used by the Druids

Listen to the voice of Adiana

Climb the ruins to reach the communing pool
Search the ruins south of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_tower.webp::name=Spire Perilous::tid=50368}} for another communal pool

Find a third dowsing site at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Afallach Byre::tid=50343}}
Find the dowsing site in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Afallach Byre::tid=50343}}
Escort Sun out of the Blighted area
Distract the Blighted and give cover for Sun's escape
Meet Morgaine in {{POI::icon=::name=Caliburne::tid=53010}} and share what you've learned

quests.description: Morgaine believes that Myrddin has hidden vital secrets away somewhere within Edengrove - and has a hunch that the towers around the crater may hold the key to finding them.\nTravel with her to the towers and investigate her theory.
rewards: Infused Angry Earth Ward Potion x5
task_desc_texts: Follow Morgaine's hunch and travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_spite.webp::name=Tor Scath::tid=50326}}
Cut a path through the {{VC::name=AngryEarth::qty=5::named=0::id=::url=}} in the tower
Search the tower for signs of Myrddin's presence
Continue to the upper levels of the tower
Insert Morgaine's key into the Ancient console

Mount Artorius's Shield on the wall
Retrieve the Key from the hidden niche
Use Galahad's Crystal to activate the nearby devices
Use Galahad's Crystal on the Ancient device above

quests.description: Unlocking the strange devices in the towers of Edengrove revealed a tower floating above the crater, which Morgaine believes to be Myrddin's prison.\nInvestigate this strange area with Morgaine and Galahad.

quests.title: The Staff of Wizardry
quests.description: At Myrddin's urging, the hunt begins for the headpiece of his Staff of Wizardry, a relic that could shift the balance of power in the fight against Corruption.\nTravel to the southern mines of Edengrove and locate the headpiece of the Staff.
task_desc_texts: Begin the search for Myrddin's Staff at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Deadwood Stand::tid=50339}}
Defeat the {{VC::name=Corrupted::qty=4::named=0::id=::url=}} and find evidence of the Staff
Continue the search for the Staff at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Annwn Deep::tid=50332}}
Defeat the {{VC::name=Corrupted::qty=6::named=0::id=::url=}} and find evidence of the Staff
Search within the mines for clues about the Staff
Examine the pick marks on the walls
Explore {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Annwn Quarry::tid=50333}} for any further sign of the Staff
Search the depths of the mine
Defeat the incoming Corrupted before they can remove the Staff
Retrieve the headpiece of Myrddin's Staff
Find Sun and see what she has learned about the Motherwell

task_desc_texts: Explore {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grove.webp::name=Welkin Fringe::tid=50308}} for signs of the mysterious Speaker
Search for evidence of the Speaker's presence
Travel up the cliff to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grovealtar.webp::name=Beinn Creag::tid=50309}}
Enter the ruins and meet the Speaker

quests.title: The Motherwell
quests.description: Against Adiana's warning, the decision has been made to purify the Staff of Wizardry in the Motherwell… even knowing the consequences.\nEnter the Motherwell and purify the Headpiece of the Staff.
task_desc_texts: Defy Adiana and enter the Motherwell
Place the Corrupted Headpiece within the Motherwell
Begin the ritual to purify the Corrupted Headpiece
Protect the Staff from the Guardians
Claim the Purified Headpiece from the Motherwell
Return to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/outpost.webp::name=Inishglory Camp::tid=53012}} to speak with Sun and Morgaine

quests.title: A Shadow Falls
quests.description: Morgaine's dream and Isabella's whispering tells of an attack on the Soulwarden fortress of Caer Dun.\nHurry to Caer Dun and investigate.
task_desc_texts: Douse the fires raging within {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/outpost.webp::name=Caer Dun::tid=50392}}
Follow Isabella's path to the west
Eliminate the Corrupted blocking the path
Return to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/outpost.webp::name=Caer Dun::tid=50392}} and tell Yash of Yonas's fate

quests.title: From the Ashes of Caer Dun
quests.description: After the sacking of Caer Dun, the Soulwardens risk losing everything if the Tempest strikes again. In order to survive, they must relocate to the presumed safety of Ebonscale Reach.
task_desc_texts: Follow Sun Fuchun to Ebonscale Reach
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the situation in Ebonscale Reach
Find the missing Soulwardens near the ambush site
Search for Grace O'Malley deeper in the forest
Talk to Grace O'Malley about the ambush
Talk to Grace O'Malley about the Tempest's spying

quests.title: Discord and Balance
quests.description: With the reveal that the Tempest can see through your eyes, the Soulwardens remain on the verge of destruction. On counsel from Sun Fuchun, a plan is devised to seek out her old master who might be able to help if he has not fallen to Corruption.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_lg.webp::name=Skysong Temple::tid=40339}} to find Sun Fuchun's old master
Search Skysong Temple for Qi Shen
Follow the trail of Qi Shen's writing
Talk to Qi Shen about the risk you pose to your allies
Talk to Qi Shen about your newfound clarity
Strike the Gongs of Harmony, Peace and Tranquility
Focus on the inner calm of self and push Isabella away
Return to your allies now that you've closed off your mind

quests.title: Together, Without a Home
quests.description: Now that the Tempest is blinded to your whereabouts and actions, the survival of the Soulwardens is starting to become possible. Rejoin them at the temporary refuge scouted out by Grace O'Malley and bring them necessary supplies.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Corrupted {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_sm.webp::name=Skysong Shrine::tid=30312}} to collect supplies the Soulwardens will need to survive
Travel to the new Soulwarden Refuge

quests.title: A New Beginning
quests.description: Survival is not enough. The gloom permeating the Soulwarden Refuge is palpable. Find a way with Grace O'Malley to raise morale and remind everyone of the need to keep hope alive.
task_desc_texts: Talk to Grace O'Malley about boosting morale
Gather thread from the stolen supplies
Remake the Soulwarden Banner at the Refuge Table
Talk to Yash Zafar about the new Soulwarden Banner

quests.title: The Empress of Ebonscale
quests.description: With hope among the Soulwardens rekindled, there remains a need for a powerful ally if they are to overcome the Tempest. Sun Fuchun has won you an audience with the Empress of Ebonscale Reach; meet with her and forge an alliance.
task_desc_texts: Search for tea bushes on the way to the audience
Travel to Heavenly Rise for an audience with Empress Zhou
Search for the Empress within the mountain

quests.title: Art of War and Friendship
quests.description: In order to win the favor of Empress Zhou, it is necessary to perform a ritual on the mountaintop now controlled by the Corrupted. Ascend the peak of Heavenly Rise while lighting incense, and ring the Celestial Bell to reassure the people of Ebonscale Reach that the Empress is still fighting for them.
task_desc_texts: Perform the ritual to ring the Celestial Bell
Ascend the Mountain of Heavenly Rise
Light the southern Royal Incense Burner
Light the northern Royal Incense Burner
Light the eastern Royal Incense Burner
(Optional) Use the portal to Empress's Retreat

quests.title: Lament of the Empress
quests.description: Assured of your good intentions and strength, Empress Zhou reveals the tragic story of her family. Work with Sun Fuchun to find a way to heal the pains of the past, and convince the Empress that the Soulwardens are worthy of an alliance with Ebonscale Reach.
task_desc_texts: Read the Empress's Book of Poetry
Talk to Empress Zhou about her son's affliction
Meet Sun Fuchun in Fortune's Crossing
(Optional) Use the portal to the settlement
Talk to Sun Fuchun about healing Prince Liang
Gather the elements for Sun Fuchun's curative
Bring the Elemental Ingredients to Sun Fuchun

quests.title: The Tormented Prince
quests.description: With your help, Sun Fuchun has all the ingredients needed to rescue Zhou Liang from his monstrous condition. Meet her at the Wood Shrine and utilize the Soulsever Incense to save him from his prison.
task_desc_texts: Meet Sun Fuchun at the Wood Shrine
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the Soulsever Incense
Burn the Soulsever Incense at the brazier
Defeat Zhou Liang to rescue his soul
Use your Azoth staff to free Liang's soul
Talk to Sun Fuchun about Zhou Liang's rescue

quests.title: Return of the Child
quests.description: Prince Liang has been saved from his affliction, fulfilling the Soulwarden's commitment to the alliance with Ebonscale Reach. Meet with Empress Zhou atop Serenity Monastery and present her son, healed and finally returned to her.
task_desc_texts: Travel to dynasty_shipwreck_30227 to collect Zhou Liang's toys
Meet Sun and Liang in Fortune's Crossing
Talk to Liang about his recovered toys
Talk to Sun Fuchun about Liang's condition
Talk to Grace O'Malley about escorting Liang
Check in with Sun Fuchun before meeting the Empress
Meet up with Grace O'Malley and Prince Liang
Find out from Grace O'Malley why the Prince is not with her
Follow Liang up the path to the Monastery
Ascend to Empress Zhou atop Serenity Monastery
Talk to Empress Zhou about her healed son
Follow Empress Zhou through the portal
