quests.description: With Empress Zhou fallen to Corruption and determined to sail away from Aeternum, Prince Liang is in danger and so is the rest of the world. On Grace O'Malley's advice, gain access to the Royal Pier and the Empress's ship.
task_desc_texts: Reach the bridge that leads to the Imperial Palace
Fight to the Palace Causeways to reach the Empress
Defeat Fleet Admiral Huang for his Seal of Command
Defeat Fleet Admiral Xin for his Seal of Command
Defeat Fleet Admiral Po for his Seal of Command

quests.title: A Mother's Dream
quests.description: With access to the Royal Pier attained, Empress Zhou can now be reached and stopped from escaping Aeternum. Confront and defeat her before Ebonscale Reach falls further into Corruption.
task_desc_texts: Take a boat to the Royal Pier and confront Empress Zhou
Search for Prince Liang and Sun Fuchun on the shore

quests.title: The New Rising Sun
quests.description: Corrupted Empress Zhou is defeated and her tragic ambitions thwarted. In the aftermath of destruction, the Soulwarden have lost a powerful ally. But Prince Liang is safe, and Ebonscale Reach is secure from further Corruption. Debrief with your allies and plan next steps in the fight against the Tempest.
task_desc_texts: Retrieve the scroll case that washed ashore
Return to Fortune's Crossing with the poem
Present the Empress's Poem to Zhou Liang
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the Prince's return

quests.title: The Shattered Mountain
quests.description: Yash Zafar's investigations into Shattered Mountain have uncovered signs that the Corrupted took an unusual interest in finding and imprisoning a specific individual. Search for this mysterious person and determine if they could be an ally in your fight against the Tempest.
task_desc_texts: Receive information from Yash before entering Shattered Mountain
Search the camp for information about the Prisoner
Read the notes left by the Prisoner
Follow the tracks to find where the Prisoner was taken
Find the Prisoner's Cell in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandonedcity.webp::name=Infernal Host::tid=40408}}
Defeat {{VC::name=Corrupted::qty=1::named=0::id=Corrupted::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Corrupted}} to collect the Key to the Prison Cell
Open the Door to Rescue the Prisoner
Rejoin Father Russo at the Outpost

quests.title: Through a Mirror Darkly
quests.description: Father Russo is convinced from your account that a spark of goodness still exists within the Tempest. Gather relics saturated with her past emotions from the time before she fell to Corruption.

quests.title: Wisdom and Madness and Folly
quests.description: With the collection of the relics, Father Russo wishes to psychically attack the Tempest with her own memories and feelings. Join him atop the nearby vista in view of the Tempest's stronghold, and strike back at her with all of your power.
task_desc_texts: Follow the trail up to Father Russo
Meet Father Russo by the altars he set up
Talk with Father Russo about the ritual
Talk to Father Russo about your meditation

quests.title: Marched Across the Land
quests.description: Now that Isabella has been wounded and frightened, it is time to secure enough allies that can overcome the defenses of Myrkgard. Yash Zafar has heard rumors that Morgaine is in trouble; search Edengrove and bring her back to the safety of the Soulwarden encampment.
task_desc_texts: Find out why Morgaine is with an Angry Earth
Question the Angry Earth about Morgaine
(Optional) Travel to Phaeris via the Teleporter
Talk to Phaeris about how to cure Morgaine
Take the Cloud Moss to Phaeris

quests.title: The Harvest is Come
quests.description: Morgaine has returned to her senses after being helped by the Angry Earth Peacemaker. Phaeris provides a surprising opportunity for the Soulwardens to secure Blighted forces in the upcoming battle against the Tempest. Create a connection between Phaeris and the Blighted Angry Earth so they can communicate.
task_desc_texts: Discuss the cryptic notes with Morgaine
Craft the Blightbane Spore Sac at your Camp
Use the Blightbane Spore Sac against the Blighted Dryads
Confirm that Phaeris now hears the Blighted

quests.title: Angel That Brings Death
quests.description: Morgaine is concerned that even with Blighted Angry Earth on their side, the Soulwardens remain at a strategic disadvantage. After being reminded of her ability in Weaver's Fen to command the Lost, she will attempt to exert her will over the Ancient Guardians in the nearby cavern to further bolster your forces.
task_desc_texts: Talk to Yash about gathering allies
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Limbus Cavatus::tid=40415}} to place the Augmentation Crystals for Morgaine
Meet up with the Soulwarden's Envoy

quests.title: As Black as Sackcloth
quests.description: At the behest of Emperor-in-Waiting Zhou Liang, Sun Fuchun has come to Shattered Mountain to offer support. She requires a special ingredient to concoct war-grade smoke bombs that will both distract the Corrupted and prevent reinforcements from flanking the Soulwardens during the imminent assault on Myrkgard.
task_desc_texts: Collect Corruption Pus at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Mantled-in-Nettles::tid=40417}} to make Smoke Bombs
Bring collected pus to Sun Fuchun to create Smoke Bombs
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Corpus Angoris::tid=40403}} to place bombs
Tell Sun you've placed the Smoke Bombs

quests.title: To Prepare a Place For You
quests.description: After much research, Father Russo has discovered what he believes is the means to achieve the Tempest's defeat and salvation. Search the depths of Illurmin Canyon for two Ancient Artifacts that he requires to craft a powerful spiritual weapon.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ore.webp::name=Apostate Nave::tid=40413}} to collect the first artifact
Find the location of the first artifact
Deactivate the pillar to access the Artifact Chamber
Travel through the barrier to collect the artifact
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ore.webp::name=Lamentations::tid=40414}} to collect the second artifact
Find the location of the the second artifact
Use the lever to access the Artifact Chamber
Take the artifacts back to Father Russo

quests.title: A Time For Peace, A Time for War
quests.description: On the eve of battle, the mood in the Soulwarden War Camp is grim. While Father Russo works to fashion his ultimate weapon, walk the camp and bolster the morale of your many allies.
task_desc_texts: Prepare your allies for the upcoming battle:

quests.title: Walls Came Tumbling Down
quests.description: The time has come to strike at the heart of Corruption. As the vanguard of the Soulwardens and their newfound allies, assault Myrkgard and overthrow the Tempest's dominion.
task_desc_texts: Charge through Myrkgard as the Soulwarden Vanguard
(Optional) Tear down Corrupted Flags and replace them with Soulwarden Banners
Discover the location of the Corrupted Portal
Continue up the path to reach Myrkgard Cathedral

quests.title: Prodigal Daughter
quests.description: The Tempest has been backed into a corner and has nowhere to retreat now except for within herself. Before she is able to open more Corruption Portals throughout Aeternum, use Father Russo's weapon to enter her mind and face her in combat for the last time.
task_desc_texts: Use your Azoth Staff to Break the Corruption Barrier
Venture into the mind of Isabella

quests.title: The First Things Have Passed Away
quests.description: Corruption has been weakened and its loudest voice has been silenced: the Tempest is gone. Find Father Russo to understand what will become of Aeternum in the passing of this storm, and celebrate the victory with your allies.
task_desc_texts: Search for signs of Father Russo back at his campsite
Meet Grace at the Soulwarden War Camp
Talk to Grace and celebrate the Soulwarden's monumental victory

quests.title: A Shifting in the Sands
quests.description: Now that Isabella has finally been defeated and the threat of her forces contained in Shattered Mountain, the Soulwardens turn their attention to whispers of new dangers arising in the deserts to the west.
task_desc_texts: Speak with Morgaine before leaving camp
Find Sun Fuchun in Fortune's Crossing
Talk to Sun Fuchun about the victory over the Tempest
Search within Brimstone Sands for Soulwarden Buhawi
Pry open the trap and save Buhawi
Talk to Buhawi and ensure his safety
Follow Buhawi to the outpost Wikala al-Waha
Talk to Buhawi about the refuge situation

quests.title: Truffle Fever
quests.description: Collect any Truffles you can find in the forest and bring them to Hapless Howe in the settlement. Look for any Herbs or Berries you can gather as well.
task_desc_texts: Equip the Sickle from Herbalist Howe
Gather {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/nutmegt1.webp::name=Delicious Truffle::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s around the marked area

quests.title: Truffle Fever
quests.description: Collect any Truffles you can find in the forest and bring them to Hapless Howe in the settlement. Look for any Herbs or Berries you can gather as well.
task_desc_texts: Equip the Sickle from Herbalist Howe
Gather {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/nutmegt1.webp::name=Delicious Truffle::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s around the marked area

quests.title: Reaper's Locus (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat the Starstone Reaper and Collect the Reaper's Locus. Talk to Herbalist Lau in the Brightwood Settlement when the task is done.
task_desc_texts: Delve into Starstone Barrows to collect the Starstone Reaper's Locus

quests.title: Secrets of the Earth
quests.description: Collect spores from Bronzeroot Warriors in Pendle Hollow and bone dust from the Lost at Pendleton. Return to Embalmer Bankole when the task is complete.
task_desc_texts: Venture into {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Pendleton::tid=40210}} for Lost Bone Dust

Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/spectraldustt1.webp::name=Ephemeral Bone Dust::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Lost in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Pendleton::tid=40210}}
Acquire Angry Earth Spores in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grove.webp::name=Pendle Hollow::tid=40268}}

Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/seasoningspicy.webp::name=Spore Satchel::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s from Bronzeroot Dryads in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grove.webp::name=Pendle Hollow::tid=40268}}

quests.title: Earth Will Provide
quests.description: Defeat the Bronzewood Dryads who are guarding stores of precious alkahest. Meet back up with Embalmer Bankole east of Bronzegrove.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Postrekhin::tid=40214}} to acquire more potent reagents

quests.title: Infernal Armaments
quests.description: Disrupt the Corrupted war effort by defeating their leaders at Corlew's Mine and Shervey's Lumbermill. Then meet with Ranger Shui Tijong outside of Calvary.
task_desc_texts: Sabotage the Corrupted mining operation at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Corlew's Mine::tid=40306}}
Defeat {{VC::name=Damned_GreatHammer_Named_01::qty=1::named=0::id=::url=}} to disrupt the Corrupted's weapon supply

Reclaim {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_starchart.webp::name=McCoy's Weapon Designs::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from chests in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/mine.webp::name=Corlew's Mine::tid=40306}}
Investigate the Corrupted logging operation at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/lumbermill.webp::name=Blairadam Mill::tid=40202}}

quests.title: Belly of the Corrupted
quests.description: Sabotage the food supply chain for the Corrupted at Reida's Burrow. Talk to Ranger Shui Tijong near Calvary when the task is done.
task_desc_texts: Sabotage the Corrupted Supply Chain at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Redden Camp::tid=40335}}

quests.title: Location Scout
quests.description: Search for vibrant waterfalls for Wolcott to paint and place an easel at each one. Talk to Painter Wolcott in Brightwood when the task is done.
task_desc_texts: Scout Northern Greyvale for a waterfall
Scout South of Greyvale for a waterfall
Scout North of Lake Genevieve for a waterfall

quests.title: Eye for Reflection
quests.description: Search for dynamic waterfalls for Wolcott to paint and place an easel at each one. Talk to Painter Wolcott in Brightwood when the task is done.
task_desc_texts: Scout Southern Greyvale for a waterfall
Scout Northern Greyvale for a waterfall
Scout Western Greyvale for a waterfall

quests.title: Wolcott's Masterpiece
quests.description: Search for picturesque lakes for Wolcott to paint and place an easel at each one. Talk to Painter Wolcott in Brightwood when the task is done.
task_desc_texts: Scout Central Greyvale for a lake
Scout Northern Greyvale for a lake
Scout Eastern Greyvale for a lake

quests.title: A Simple Tea
quests.description: Collect Undefiled Tea Leaves from Verdant Cavern and Lush Sugarsap from the Lush Hideaway. Bring them back to Naturalist Khunbish in Brightwood.
task_desc_texts: Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/parsleyt1.webp::name=Undefiled Tea Leaves::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from Angry Earth chests in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cave.webp::name=Verdant Cavern::tid=40229}}

Harvest {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/ironwoodsapt2.webp::name=Lush Sugarsap::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Young Trees in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cave.webp::name=Lush Hideaway::tid=40248}}

quests.title: Azoth Tree Achene
quests.description: Defeat the Angry Earth Leader Ceran at the Azoth Tree and collect his Achene. Talk to Naturalist Khunbish in Brightwood when the task is done.
task_desc_texts: Defeat the Angry Earth Leader at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=The Azoth Tree::tid=40222}}

quests.title: Grizzly Neighbors
quests.description: Help Hunter Hutchison in Brightwood get vengeance against some savage bears in Greyvale that destroyed his family.

quests.title: Papa Bear (Elite)
quests.description: Hunter Hutchison has asked you to destroy Gren, the massive bear who killed his wife, and reclaim his wife's ring. Bring the ring back to Hunter Hutchinson in Brightwood.
task_desc_texts: Track down the Alpha Bear at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/bear_den.webp::name=Gren's Place::tid=50391}}

quests.title: Memories of Another Life
quests.description: Megara Pantazis lived in the Walsham area many decades ago. She's asked you to retrieve her mementos from the town and return them to her in Brightwood so she can relive her past.
task_desc_texts: Search for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_corruptedkeepsake.webp::name=Megara's Mementos::drop=100%::rarity=common}} in chests in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Walsham::tid=40257}}

quests.title: Til Death do us Part
quests.description: Megara Pantazis has admitted the love of her life was actually Pastor Prewitt. She's asked you be sure nothing of his human nature remains. Talk to her in Brightwood when the task is complete.
task_desc_texts: Confront Pastor Prewitt at the Walsham Congregation

quests.title: Earthly Treasures
quests.description: Aethelwynn, a self-proclaimed treasure hunter, needs help finding lucrative graves in Brightwood. Find records of Brightwood's residents, then return to Aethelwynn near Deggendorf.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Deggendorf::tid=40261}} to help Aethelwynn find treasures left by the Lost
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cathedral.webp::name=Ballard's Manor::tid=40260}} to help Aethelwynn find treasures left by the Lost

Search chests at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cathedral.webp::name=Ballard's Manor::tid=40260}} for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_lockedbookglowingrunes.webp::name=Resident Records::drop=100%::rarity=common}}

quests.title: Lost and Returned
quests.description: Aethelwynn has identified two promising graves that might contain treasure. Scatter the lost defending the coffins, and investigate each grave. Then, return to Aethelwynn with your spoils.
task_desc_texts: Venture into {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Wolfsegg Village::tid=40263}} to search for treasure

Search chests in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Wolfsegg Village::tid=40263}} for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/armor/bagat2.webp::name=Silver-filled Pouch::drop=100%::rarity=common}}es
Visit {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Kalterstein Cemetery::tid=40327}} to search for treasure
Search coffin in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Kalterstein Cemetery::tid=40327}} for Valuables

quests.title: Music to Her Ears
quests.description: Though nervous about its fearful reputation, Aethelwynn still wants to see if there's treasure in the old Cathedral and its neighboring village. Investigate each location, then return to Aethelwynn.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Morgenstadt::tid=40310}} for clues to more treasure

quests.title: Dark Legacy
quests.description: Though Aethelwynn said she would meet you later, she is nowhere to be seen. Mortemer's Manor and Brightrest Cemetery seem to be the most likely locations to find her.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Mortemer Manor::tid=40254}} for any sign of Aethelwynn
Look for coffins with potential treasure
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Brightrest Cemetery::tid=40253}} for any sign of Aethelwynn

quests.title: Reunion
quests.description: Aethelwynn is finally ready to face her past and tell you what she's been seeking. Help her track down her brother-in-law by searching nearby villages, then return to her at the spirit shrine.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Sinanovic Farm::tid=40251}} for clues about Roderick
Defeat the {{VC::name=Lost::qty=1::named=0::id=Lost::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Lost}} and look for any signs of Roderick
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Graybrooke Farmstead::tid=40252}} for clues about Roderick

quests.title: Heart of Darkness (Elite)
quests.description: Aethelwynn suspects that her sister's necklace is in the greedy hands of Archminister Havelock. Destroy him, find the necklace, and return to Aethelwynn at the spirit shrine.
task_desc_texts: Journey to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/graveyard_elite.webp::name=Brightwood Isle::tid=40221}} and Destroy Archminister Havelock

Search for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/armor/amuletaquamarinet5.webp::name=Emmeline's Necklace::drop=40%::rarity=common}} from chests at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/graveyard_elite.webp::name=Brightwood Isle::tid=40221}}

quests.title: As Good As My Word
quests.description: Find Ranger Heo Do-yun's previous associates. Once found, let them know Heo Do-yun is still alive.
task_desc_texts: Find and talk to Ranger Jasvir Tenavan
Find and talk to Ranger Marikit Rizal

quests.title: Mapping The Edge Of Despair
quests.description: Find the best locations to map out enemy camps in northern Great Cleave. Then bring your notes back to Ranger Heo Do-yun.
task_desc_texts: Map the landscape to the west
Map the landscape to the east

quests.title: Picking Up The Pieces
quests.description: Recover weapons and armor from Ranger Heo Do-yun's fallen companions. Recover Mardea's Shield, Hanu's Spear, Topalian's Helm, and Kaipo's Axe.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Ostrog Maul::tid=40319}} for Mardea's Shield and Hanu's Spear
Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Ostrog Pike::tid=40318}} for Topalian's Helm and Kaipo's Axe

quests.title: The Balemaw Beast
quests.description: Find the notorious Balemaw Beast which has been preying on travelers in the region.
task_desc_texts: Follow clues to the Balemaw Beast

quests.title: Wolves Of Winter
quests.description: Track the beasts that have been attacking travelers to their lair and defeat them.
task_desc_texts: Discover what manner of beast lives at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/wolf_den.webp::name=Fera Antrum::tid=40432}}

quests.title: The Beast Returns
quests.description: The Balemaw Beast struck again! Track the beast up Mangled Heights and defeat it!
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/azure_tree.webp::name=Gorikbouri Road::tid=40343}} to find clues about the real Balemaw Beast
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_buttress.webp::name=Lodestone Grom::tid=30301}} to find the Balemaw Beast

quests.title: A Spot Of Luxury
quests.description: Gather beautiful Spotted Pelts from Bobcats to add to Rue Horne's collection.
task_desc_texts: Hunt Bobcats in Frosted Floe to gather Spotted Pelts

quests.title: Fabulous Furs
quests.description: Gather fantastically colored pelts from local cougars and elk to add to Rue Horne's collection.
task_desc_texts: Hunt Snowy Cougars in the Braided Hills to gather Red Striped Pelts
Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/leathert4.webp::name=Red Striped Pelts::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from Snowy Cougar
Hunt Tainted Stags in the Icy Wilds to gather Blue Striped Pelts
Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_blanket.webp::name=Blue Striped Pelts::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from Tainted Stag

quests.title: Pure Delight
quests.description: Gather brilliant Pure White Pelts from wolves to add to Rue Horne's collection.
task_desc_texts: Hunt Alabaster Wolves in the Icy Wilds to gather Pure White Pelts
Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/purewhitepelts.webp::name=Pure White Pelts::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from Alabaster Wolf

quests.title: White As Bone
quests.description: Collect Ancient Ivory for Valta so she can add it to a poppet.

quests.title: Red As Blood
quests.description: Collect blood red Firebright Rubies from the mine for Valta so she can add them to a poppet.

quests.title: Black As Ebony
quests.description: Collect night black pieces of Charred Ebony for Valta so she can add them to a poppet.
task_desc_texts: Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/charcoalt1.webp::name=Fragments of Charred Ebony::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from chests

quests.title: An Offering For Offspring
quests.description: Travel to the Wishing Tree and leave the Poppet as an offering so that Valta may one day have a child of her own.
task_desc_texts: Place Valta's Poppet at the Wishing Tree

quests.title: Perfect Piroshkis
quests.description: Gather Dried Dill, Crumbly Aged Cheese, and Tenderized Meat for Aksinya.
task_desc_texts: Collect Crumbly Aged Cheese at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Ostrog Scythe::tid=40315}}
Collect Tenderized Meat from Tainted Stags in greatcleave4

quests.title: To Warm The Soul Warden
quests.description: Bring Piping-Hot Piroshkis to Soulwarden Pedro Carrillo at Warden's Rise before they get cold!
task_desc_texts: Travel to Warden's Rise to bring piroshkis to Soulwarden Pedro Carrillo before they get cold

quests.title: Ice Chronicles
quests.description: Find Kazu, the owner of the journal. Maybe he can teach you more about the glyphs in Aeternum.

quests.title: Glyph Of The Wolf
quests.description: Kazu turned blind when he tried to activate the strange new glyph. Help him research a similar one at Mokosh Springs.

quests.title: The Curse That Goes Round
quests.description: Break the curse that has Simone going around in circles.
task_desc_texts: Find Simone's bag to break the curse

quests.title: A Passing Good Knight
quests.description: Assist an aged and possibly delusional knight with his plan to impress the Soulwardens.

quests.title: Armed At All Points
quests.description: Defeat the Siege Engineers at Riven Anvil.
task_desc_texts: Defeat the Siege Engineers at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Riven Anvil::tid=40308}}

quests.title: Battle Wounds Bestow Honor
quests.description: Alas and alack! As Sir Hotspur lays stricken, accept the mantle and report to the Soulwardens.
task_desc_texts: Dig up the map to the Soulwardens

quests.title: Orbs of Power
quests.description: Gypsum Kilns are used to create powerful items. Find Gypsum then learn the ways of the kiln.
task_desc_texts: Gypsum Kilns are used to create powerful items. Find Gypsum then learn the ways of the kiln.

Search chests for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/gypsumblue.webp::name=Sapphire Gypsum::drop=30%::rarity=epic}} at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Huntsman's Folly::tid=40307}}

quests.title: No Good Deed
quests.description: Recover the supplies described in Huntsman Lee's requisition note and discover the fate of his porter, Riker.
task_desc_texts: Follow the wolf tracks to find Riker

quests.title: Fine Furs For Fine Folk
quests.description: Acquire Midnight Hides from Midnight Den to replicate Huntsman Lee's fancy jacket for inquiring noble families.
task_desc_texts: Seek fine furs at the Midnight Den
Slay Midnight Wolves in search of quality furs

quests.title: A Circle of Stars
quests.description: Investigate towers Orion and Draco to acquire Ancient Devices, then return them with the notes to William Heron in the Everfall Settlement.
task_desc_texts: Search the tower Draco for another device

quests.title: Stellar Research
quests.description: Investigate towers Perseus and Lupus, then return to William Heron to tell him what you found.

quests.title: Beacons in the Dark
quests.description: Investigate towers Norma, Leo, and Hercules and see if there is a way to activate them.
task_desc_texts: Find a way to activate the tower Norma
Investigate the base of the obelisk
Find a way to activate the tower Leo
Find a way to activate the tower Hercules
Meet William Heron near Fisherman's Bend

quests.title: Azoth Awakening
quests.description: Collect Azoth Dust from Ancient Guardians at towers Canus, Ursa, and Monoceros.
task_desc_texts: Collect bone samples from Ancient Guardians

quests.title: Constellation Convergence
quests.description: Retrieve the Armillary Sphere from the Shattered Obelisk, along with Ancient Runekeys held by its defenders. Return them to William Heron, who hopes to unlock the Armillary Sphere.
task_desc_texts: Locate the Armillary Sphere from the Shattered Obelisk
Defeat Ancient Guardians for keys to the Armillary Sphere

quests.title: Foreman's Ledger (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Foreman's Ledger in Amrine Excavation. Report back to William Heron in the Everfall Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Starstone of Shattering (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Starstone Diadem from Greundgul the Regent inside the Shattered Obelisk. Report back to William Heron in the Everfall Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Dishonorable Daughter
quests.description: Venture into Arcturus to recover an item of equal value to the one Tamra Ayad destroyed in her home estate, and return the item to Tamra Ayad.
task_desc_texts: Collect an {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/ancientvase.webp::name=Ancient Vase::drop=20%::rarity=common}} from Ancient Guardians at Arcturus

quests.title: Curious Child
quests.description: Bring the Ancient Scrolls to Tamra Ayad to assess their value.

quests.title: An Heir Transformed
quests.description: Venture into the Varangian camp to recover the stolen Ancient relics for Tamra Ayad.

quests.title: Canary in the Corrupted Mine
quests.description: Scout the land of Canary Mine to investigate the Corrupted threat.

quests.title: Salting the Earth
quests.description: Poison the earth of Ebonrock Cavern and Ebonrock Quarry while taking down as many Corrupted as you can for Tekla Petrowski.
task_desc_texts: Poison the soil within Ebonrock Cavern
Poison the soil of Ebonrock Quarry

quests.title: Tekla's Tragedy
quests.description: Venture to the Everfall Settlement to discuss the Corrupted incursion with Huntsman Odnell Lee.
task_desc_texts: Speak to Huntsman Lee in Oxboro

quests.title: Avenging Audrey
quests.description: Shame the Corrupted forces occupying Kelleher's Farmstead by taking out the Lieutenants and speak to Tekla Petrowski.

quests.title: Bittersweet Memory
quests.description: Return the Lost Locket to Tekla Petrowski.

quests.title: The Lovers' Flowers
quests.description: Touched by your return of the locket, Tekla Petrowski wishes for you to gather a bouquet of Meadowlake Flowers at Meadowlake Fishery to remember Audrey.

quests.title: Lee's Condolences
quests.description: Relay what has happened with Tekla Petrowski to Odnell Lee in the Everfall Settlement.

quests.title: The Magnum Opus
quests.description: Longing to rise above his station as a butler, Atticus Delphi wishes to share his musical talents with the world. With so many instruments to choose from, he is struck with a moment of indecision.
task_desc_texts: Ask to borrow an instrument from Magistrate Clark
Ask to borrow an instrument from Constable Maecia
Search the tavern for an instrument

quests.title: Reputation is Everything
quests.description: What good is a composition if it goes unheard? Play the Magnum Opus throughout the town in a grand debut as a composer!

quests.title: It's Who You Know
quests.description: With his reputation growing with each passing day, now is the time to seek a patron. One does not simply approach the patriarch of a great house on a whim, however…
task_desc_texts: Speak to the Ou Family maid
Repair the Broken Pocket Watch at a Workshop

quests.title: Everyone has a Price
quests.description: The great family Sacco will not be humiliated so easily. With Atticus bound to his contractual duties, his patron may be the only one who can set him free to practice his craft.
task_desc_texts: Ask Lady Sacco for her terms
Relay her response to Lord Shen
Return to Lady Sacco with the offer

quests.title: Ever Been Mauled?
quests.description: Felix Livius challenges you to "wrestle" a bear for the raw thrill of it all.

quests.title: Bragging Rights
quests.description: Talk to Huntsman Lee in the Everfall Settlement about your bear experience.

quests.title: Hope in a Bottle
quests.description: The Lost Pirates of the Riverworn Grotto have stolen Jacob Evans' last shipment of mead, driving him to the brink of despair.

quests.title: No Time for Wine
quests.description: With his mead returned, Jacob Evans turns his attention to his next source of woe: a shipment of missing wine.

quests.title: Master and Commandaria
quests.description: Jacob Evans has remembered the name of one of his tormentors. Help him get some revenge on Admiral Arias.

quests.title: Raising the Bar
quests.description: Jacob is entrusting you with delivering the priceless bottle of Commandaria to Polly's bar, in the hopes that it will save her business.
task_desc_texts: Talk to Polly the Everfall Barkeep

quests.title: Cure For What Ails You
quests.description: The wares that Anwir is hawking seem a little suspect. Nevertheless, he's happy to pay for help "improving" them.
task_desc_texts: Search the wilds for cougars and rams
Meet Anwir Hughes near the Covenant Enclave

quests.title: The Secret Ingredient
quests.description: Anwir Hughes is back, with another scheme to "improve" his Ancient Miracle Elixir.
task_desc_texts: Explore Nettlerest Graveyard for Anwir's secret ingredient

quests.title: Potions for the People
quests.description: Nothing can go wrong with distributing Anwir's Ancient Miracle Elixir to the people of Everfall, right?
task_desc_texts: Deliver Anwir's potions to the citizens of Oxboro

quests.title: Bottle It Up
quests.description: Try to piece together the strange alchemical recipe, then bring it to a Syndicate alchemist for further study.

quests.title: Miner's Keepers
quests.description: One ill-fated miner's find is another better-fated miner's treasure.
task_desc_texts: Find and mine the abandoned claim

quests.title: The Yearly Convergence
quests.description: Welcome to the Winter Convergence! Check out the Holiday Huts in the Winter Villages to see what items can be crafted there.

quests.description: Find one of the many Lost Presents around Aeternum and return it to the Winter Wanderer in the Winter Village.
task_desc_texts: Gather a Lost Present from around Aeternum, or investigate the site mentioned by the Winter Wanderer

quests.description: Mine a fallen Gleamite Crystal and return it to the Winter Wanderer in the Winter Village.
task_desc_texts: Gather a fallen Gleamite Crystal from a Gleamite Shower at night, or investigate the site mentioned by the Winter Wanderer

quests.title: Forever Winter
quests.description: Locate the Winter Warrior's spread of the Forever Winter and collect his Hailspikes as proof of victory against the chiling threat.
task_desc_texts: Locate and put an end to the Winter Warrior's Forever Winter in Great Cleave, Ebonscale Reach, or Brimstone Sands and retrieve his Hailspikes as proof of victory

task_desc_texts: Enter the Arena via 'Activities' in the Menu

quests.description: Mysterious Raiders have taken over the ruins of Stonereach Keep where Abigail Rose was living. She's asked you to help figure who they are, why they're here and how she can get rid of them.
task_desc_texts: Investigate Stonereach Keep for clues to the Raiders' purpose here
Visit {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Porta Maris War Camp::tid=30143}} and Confront the Raiders' Leader

quests.description: Locate Abigail Rose's missing companion, and find any evidence that points to what the Varangian Knights are searching for.
task_desc_texts: Search for Abigail's missing companion among the Varangians in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Sorcerer's Delve::tid=40174}}

Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/castle.webp::name=Riverside Keep::tid=40287}} to rescue Abigail's companion, Romac

quests.title: The Bear of Scratchrock
quests.description: Hunt Pumas in the area and bring down the bear of Scratchrock Burrow. Report back to Tsui Fen when the task is complete.
task_desc_texts: Hunt Pumas and look for signs of the Bear's Victim
Follow trail of Bloodied Cloth to the Bear's Den

quests.title: Shot Across the Bow
quests.description: Sabotage cannons and light striped powderkegs on fire at the pirate stronghold. Defeat Shamgar then return to Michael Lewis.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/hero_shipwreck.webp::name=Dragon's Teeth Falls::tid=40137}} to thwart the pirates
Set fire to the Striped Powderkegs throughout {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/hero_shipwreck.webp::name=Dragon's Teeth Falls::tid=40137}}
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/hero_shipwreck.webp::name=Captain Korrapati's Hideout::tid=40122}} to thwart the pirates

quests.title: Warp and Weft
quests.description: Collect Loom Patterns and Fabric Samples from Sirius and Stoneview Seabreak.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Shrine of Sirius::tid=40123}} to collect Loom Patterns
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=The Bottomless Cup::tid=40121}} to collect Fabric Samples

quests.title: Zoology 101
quests.description: Margot is researching strange things in Aeternum. She wants to know why there are Buffalo here. Investigate the area and gather samples and any notes you find regarding them.
task_desc_texts: Go to southwindsward9 and search for info on the buffalo

quests.title: A Wyrd and Wonderful World
quests.description: Margot has discovered a plant that seems to have strange properties. Gather sprigs of it and present them to people around Windsward to see what their reactions are.

quests.title: This Mortal Sphere
quests.description: A group of archeologists have gone missing near an ancient tomb. Follow their trail and discover what has happened then report back to Elric Chapman.
task_desc_texts: Explore {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins_spheres.webp::name=Kannan Tomb::tid=40101}} and Search for the Missing Antiquarians
Read the journal entry 'The Dig Site: Day 1'

quests.title: Creation Myths
quests.description: Elric has some interesting theories about the spheres. Follow his instructions and set them in place. Then report your findings back to him.

quests.title: Towering Tools
quests.description: Collect any remaining tools of the Ancients from Fallswatch Overlook and Mirador, then return to Antiquarian Pajitnova in Windsward.
task_desc_texts: Investigate {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Mirador Shrine::tid=40153}} for any remaining tools of the Ancients
Investigate {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Fallswatch Overlook::tid=40152}} for any remaining tools of the Ancients

quests.title: Taken to Task
quests.description: Defeat Kisare the Taskmaster to acquire the Taskmaster's Heart. Then report back to Antiquarian Pajitnova in Windsward.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_lg.webp::name=Amrine Temple::tid=40105}} to locate the Taskmaster's Heart

quests.title: Seeing Clearly (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Antiquarian's Eyepiece from Simon Grey in Amrine Excavation for Antiquarian Pajitnova in Windsward.

quests.title: Give a Dog a Bone (Expedition)
quests.description: Simon Grey's dog Barkimedes is awaiting his master's return and is very hungry. From what you can tell he would appreciate having some Ravager bones to gnaw on.

quests.title: Bones For Barkimedes (Expedition)
quests.description: Simon Grey's dog Barkimedes is awaiting his master's return and is very hungry. From what you can tell he would appreciate having some Ravager bones to gnaw on.

quests.title: More Bones for Barkimedes (Expedition)
quests.description: Simon Grey's dog Barkimedes wants an enhanced bone-chewing experience from the Enchanted Bones of the Shattered Obelisk expedition.

quests.title: Pushing Back
quests.description: Eliminate the Corrupted in Weeping-and-Gnashing and Corpus Angoris, and recover any supplies left behind. Then report back to Warden Reese in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Continue your attack on the Corrupted in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Weeping-and-Gnashing::tid=40401}}
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Corpus Angoris::tid=40403}} and strike a blow against the Corruption

quests.title: Our Own Worst Enemy
quests.description: Search for Soulwarden Heartgems across the five forts in Shattered Mountain, and search for any Corrupted writings. Then report back to Ranger Madaki in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Continue your search for Heartgems at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Nomine Damnis::tid=40402}}
Determine if fallen Soulwardens are present
Continue your search for Heartgems at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Corpus Angoris::tid=40403}}
Search for 'Pruning a Twisted Vine' journal entry
Continue your search for Heartgems at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Weeping-and-Gnashing::tid=40401}}
Continue your search for Heartgems at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Mantled-in-Nettles::tid=40417}}
Search for 'Duality of the Word' journal entry
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Hewn-from-Hell::tid=40404}} and search for Soulwarden Heartgems
Search for 'A Sinister Intent' journal entry

quests.title: The Illurmin Rift
quests.description: Explore the deadly Illurmin Rift and deliver your discoveries to Warden Linch in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Proceed into {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ore.webp::name=Apostate Nave::tid=40413}} and continue scouting the Corrupted
Continue reconnaissance of the Illurmin Rift
Ascend from the Illurmin Rift and travel to the Soulwarden War Camp

quests.title: Guardians' Secrets
quests.description: Defeat Guardian Tzi-Wang, recover Baetylus Luckstones, and defeat Rockruins Guardians in Limbus Cavatus. Then report back to Warden Reese in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Delve into {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Limbus Cavatus::tid=40415}} and seek the Ancient Guardians' secrets

quests.title: Alligator Steaks
quests.description: Hunt Shattered Alligators for Gator Steaks and seek out bundles of Mirespice Blend held by the Desolate Scroungers. Then report back to Warden Douglas in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Enter the shatteredmountain3 and seek out the ingredients

Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/0715_0101_salsnailessence.webp::name=Shattered Gator Steak::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Alligators of the shatteredmountain3

Recover {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_aeternumspice.webp::name=Mirespice Blend::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Scroungers in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_village.webp::name=Acherusia::tid=40418}}

quests.title: Malevolent Offerings
quests.description: End the rituals in Hewn-from-Hell and Mantled-in-Nettles by eliminating the Corrupted Vicars, their guards, and their Corruption Barbs, then reclaim their Corrupted ritual implements. Then report back to Warden Linch in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Assault {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Hewn-from-Hell::tid=40404}} and smite the servants of the Corrupted Vicars
Put an end to the rituals in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/fort.webp::name=Mantled-in-Nettles::tid=40417}} and strike down the Corrupted Vicars

quests.title: Clarion Offensive
quests.description: Defeat Dau-Shin and recover Armor Scraps from the Rockrift Carvers in Limbus Cavatus. Then report back to Warden Fayed in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Confront the Ancient Guardians of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Limbus Cavatus::tid=40415}}

Defeat {{VC::name=Ancient_Guardian_Mage_Named_07SM07::qty=1::named=0::id=::url=}} in the depths of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_ruins.webp::name=Limbus Cavatus::tid=40415}}

quests.title: Knowledge is Power
quests.description: Get a fresh blight sample from a Blight Nodule in Wanhope Wold. Then report back to Ranger Herath in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Venture into the shatteredmountain9 and seek out a Blight Nodule
Locate a gathering of Putridspore Cultivators
Gather {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/carneliant4.webp::name=Cystic Blight Sample::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from a Blight Nodule

quests.title: Blight Resistance
quests.description: Collect a Blight Sample from the Baleful Lair and defeat Fay, the Last Protector. Bring a piece of his remains to Ranger Herath in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Continue to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/angryearth_grovealtar.webp::name=Fell Belfry::tid=50418}} and seek out Fay, the Last Protector
Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cave.webp::name=Baleful Lair::tid=50412}} and collect the Blight Sample

quests.title: Madaki's Stratagem
quests.description: Search the forges of Infernal Host for any weapon molds or crucibles they might be using to forge weapons of great power. Then report back to Ranger Madaki in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Baetylus Headpiece (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat the Cilla in the Lazarus Instrumentality Expedition and Collect the Naga Headdress. Then report back to Warden Reese in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Venture into the Lazarus Instrumentality Expedition

quests.title: Ultimate Blight Defense (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat the Alluvium Marl and Collect Alluvium Spores for Ranger Herath in Shattered Mountain.
task_desc_texts: Venture into the Garden of Genesis

quests.title: The Tempest's Soul (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter Tempest's Heart and Defeat Isabella de Leon.

quests.title: Isabella De Leon (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about Isabella's past in Spain with her brothers. Then defeat Isabella de Leon again with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: Isabella's Corruption (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about how Isabella was offered the mantle of Corruption. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.
task_desc_texts: Read Lore Note 'The Offering of the Apple'

quests.title: Rise of Captain Isabella (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about Isabella's descent into cruelty with her crew by investigating the graves where they were buried alive. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.
task_desc_texts: Honor the Grave of Isabella's buried crew.

quests.title: Death of the Heretic (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about the Heretic's true power and talk to the Heretic. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: The Possession of Russo (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out the truth about Isabella and Father Russo, and what is to come, and talk to Father Russo. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.
task_desc_texts: Read Lore Note 'Father Russo and Isabella'

quests.title: Isabella's Madness (Expedition)
quests.description: Recover a shard of Isabella's madness in the ashes of her defeat for Mara Rosa to study.

quests.title: To Be Free
quests.description: Free the baby tigers for Ma Xinyi.
task_desc_texts: Gather {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/lockkeyt1.webp::name=Dynasty Keys::drop=100%::rarity=common}} to unlock tiger cages

quests.title: Scourging The Scourge
quests.description: Defeat Ivan The Scourge for Elder Danya.

quests.title: Flowers for the Departed
quests.description: Place the flowers at Skysong Crypt to check if Elder Danya's comrades have found peace.
task_desc_texts: Place the flowers at the altar

quests.title: The Corrupted Streak
quests.description: Defeat the group of Corrupted tigers for Ma Xinyi and end the cycle.
task_desc_texts: Drive off Corrupted Tigers at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cat_den.webp::name=Laohu Hollow::tid=30236}}

quests.title: The Mystery Within
quests.description: Help Yue study the Corrupted nodule at Imperial Army Campsite.
task_desc_texts: Examine the Corruted nodule at dynasty_camp_30237

quests.title: Treasured Trinkets
quests.description: Recover Chinese heirlooms from the Corrupted and give them to Yue so she can discover more about her past.

quests.title: Sins of the Brothers
quests.description: Help Bardroy's sons, Bartolome and Bartholomew see sense and stop fighting each other.

quests.title: The Show Must Go On
quests.description: Get black ink from Void Pitchers so Magistrate Redridge may complete her play about the Empress.
task_desc_texts: Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/corruptedessencet2.webp::name=Black Pigment::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from Void Pitchers around Ebonscale Reach

quests.title: Study In Green
quests.description: Acquire Dryad Wood for Artificer Long to craft robust armor against the Corrupted.

quests.title: Statuette Stash
quests.description: Collect four Statuettes as told by handmaiden Zeng, to disrupt the Corrupted ritual.
task_desc_texts: Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/moonstonecutt3.webp::name=Metal Dragon Statuette::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Metal Shrine
Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/lapislazulit2.webp::name=Water Dragon Statuette::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Water Shrine
Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/infusedresint5.webp::name=Earth Dragon Statuette::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Earth Shrine
Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/jaspert4.webp::name=Fire Dragon Statuette::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from the Fire Shrine

quests.title: Family Puzzles
quests.description: Return the puzzle box to Bardroy and discover the prize his sons were fighting to own.
task_desc_texts: Retrieve the puzzle box from {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/shipwreck.webp::name=Stormcourt Shipment::tid=30226}}

quests.title: Shrine Cleansing
quests.description: Cleanse Skysong Temple for Artificer Long.

quests.title: Legacy Reclaimed
quests.description: Collect Passenger Scrolls from the Corrupted for Yue to study.

quests.title: The Red Claw
quests.description: Collect a Crimson Paw from Redclaw for a red dye for Xiang Enlai.

quests.title: Serenity In Chaos
quests.description: Destroy Corrupted forces at Serenity Monastery. Then report back to Artificer Long.
task_desc_texts: Disrupt the Corrupted meeting at dynasty_monastery_30240

quests.title: Strings of Fate
quests.description: Retrieve red strings from Dynasty Corrupted for Xiang Enlai and Yue.
task_desc_texts: Defeat Dynasty Corrupted for {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_needleandthread.webp::name=Red Strings of Fate::drop=100%::rarity=common}}

quests.title: Revenge of a Playwright
quests.description: Sabotage the Corrupted operations as payback for spoiling Redridge's play.

quests.title: End of Her Reign (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat Empress Zhou Taiying and her Captains. Then report back to Zeng Lingyun in the Ebonscale Settlement.

quests.title: Justice For The Dynasty (Expedition)
quests.description: Obtain Dynasty Shackles from Dynasty Shipyard Lieutenants and return them to Liberator Guo outside the Dynasty Shipyards In Ebonscale.

quests.title: Secret of the Spores
quests.description: Master Alchemist Eadred has made a revolutionary discovery critical to the invasion. Investigate the strange spores blooming in the region and learn how you can use them to your advantage.\n(Requires: Harvesting 100)
task_desc_texts: Travel to Mosswater Bend to collect spore samples\n(Requires: Harvesting 100)
Gather Spores from plants in Mosswater Bend
Speak to Master Alchemist Theodore Eadred
Craft Weak Boon of Demeter Potion at an Arcane Repository or Camp
Drink the Weak Boon of Demeter Potion

quests.title: Endangered by Artemis
quests.description: The Druid Keira implores you to aid the wildlife native to the region. The cries of animals call out from the depths of the jungle, and she feels their fear. Do what you can to keep them from becoming food for some new monstrosity.
task_desc_texts: Save the wildlife south of Forellac

quests.title: A Beast No More
quests.description: Sebastian Vachon is pursuing a dangerous beast and needs your help finding it so he can study its origins. Follow its tracks through the region, defeat it, and bring its cerebrum back to the Druid.
task_desc_texts: Find the first sign of tracks

quests.title: Firing Back
quests.description: Albert Riches, the survivalist of First Light left behind some battle plans and a note. How did he know we would be coming? In any case, we should help. Go into Charlottesburgh and complete the Survivalist's bombastic plan.

quests.title: A Friend in Need
quests.description: Another potential survivor, James Oxen, appears to have dropped a check-list of supplies. There is a crude drawing of a cave on the back. Collect the supplies, find the cave, and protect the survivors.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the cave from the note

quests.title: Tracking the Herd
quests.description: The Knight-Errant Fionn hopes we can render some assistance investigating the migratory behavior of the beasts moving between the nearby territory and the northern beastlands. Follow the clues and report back.
task_desc_texts: Search for Migration Evidence Along the Coast
Collect a sample of beast droppings

quests.title: Plague for All Factions
quests.description: Ramla and her crew have come down with a mysterious illness. Something dangerous has awoken in these ruins and someone tough will be needed to investigate. See if you can solve the mystery.
task_desc_texts: Put a Stop to the Curse

quests.title: Defective Defenses
quests.description: Josephine and her Syndicate specialists were ambushed when they set off some form of automated defense system within Tideswallow. Now they need someone to deal with the Ancient Guardians and finish the repairs.
task_desc_texts: Defeat Anubian Guardians to Retrieve Ancient Conduit

quests.title: Factions United
quests.description: The flow of power has been restored to the Marauders at Saircor, and Kievan needs help with the final step of the operation. Fight off the Ancient Guardians and assist with the repairs so he can gain control of their defenses.
task_desc_texts: Collect Kievan's tools from the West of the Orrery
Collect Kievan's tools from the South of the Orrery
Collect Kievan's tools from the East of the Orrery
Assist Kievan with Breaching the Device
Complete the Quest Encounter "Breaching the System"

quests.title: The Heart of a Beast
quests.description: Pinned beneath a mysterious, rusted axe lies a note - addressed to you. It asks that you hold your judgment of the fabled Minotaur until you learn his story. Collect relics lost in the labyrinth, then speak with Marwa.

quests.title: Challenge of Character
quests.description: Marwa Shaheen has heard of your recent exploits, and knows more trials lie ahead. She wishes to offer a challenge to bolster your resolve. Visit Marwa and complete the time trial that she has prepared.

quests.title: Gauntlet of Kings
quests.description: Shirzad believes you must increase in strength if you are to quell the rage of the tainted Beast Lords and their tribes. Return to his den at Shirzad's Pride and once again brave the grotto below.
task_desc_texts: Visit the Shrine of the Herd

quests.title: Battle of the Beasts
quests.description: Barug of the Gorillas now stands in Kurok's stead, but without their Lord the tribe is in grave danger. Rally your fellow warriors to help the Gorilla tribe fight off an incursion by a champion of the Lizard Lord.

quests.title: The Tribunal Highmound
quests.description: Manmosu, the new matriarch of the mammoth tribe, has taken refuge in a cave near the Tribunal Highmound to prepare for battle. Speak with her, and then prepare to assault the Highmound and its leaders.

quests.title: Medusa's Monstrosities
quests.description: Johannes Metzger needs assistance investigating the sinister magic Medusa had been channeling in Scalefang Enclave. Reach out to the rogue scientist, help him gather samples, and work with the mysterious technology there.

quests.title: Medusa's Magic
quests.description: Johannes Metzger has even grander ambitions. Too grand to accomplish alone. Find him in the dark village and Help him with his final tasks, and he promises to share part of the credit for whatever he learns.
task_desc_texts: Participate in the grand scientific achievement
Participate in The Grand Scientific Achievement

quests.title: The Siege of Light's Crown
quests.description: Ranger-Captain Hargest has advanced into inner Light's Crown to establish a perimeter, but she needs assistance. Help the rangers restock their munitions, bolster their defenses, and fend off attacks.
task_desc_texts: Help with repairs and protect Ranger Treadwell

quests.title: Essence of Evil
quests.description: Heinrich Gauss has been dispatched to investigate the dark energy pouring out of Elafry Pyrgo and assess its potential danger to the humans of Aeternum. Help him to gather samples using his proprietary capture devices.
task_desc_texts: Reach the Second Floor of Elafry Pyrgo
Defeat the Scourge of the Storm

quests.title: The Savage Divide (Expedition)
quests.description: The time has come to face the Beast Lords lost within the Savage Divide. Manmosu asks that we act as her champion, lest she risk infection by going herself. Gather your greatest allies, descend into the Divide, and defeat the Lords.

quests.title: Among the Statues
quests.description: Dame Edith Henrietta Shackleton has gotten herself into a bit of a situation in the maze. She requires help acquiring antiquities that have been turned to stone.

quests.title: Containing the Contagion (Expedition)
quests.description: Archdruid Trahern has been hard at work researching methods for combating the magical plants spreading throughout the Savage Divide. He needs your assistance planting his newly created seeds within the depths of the cavern.

quests.title: Smell the Future
quests.description: Arnold Trost has discovered Lost are repulsed by man-sized sticks of burning incense. Venture into The Salty Marshes and light a Lost Deterrence Pylon to keep them out of Spyglass Ridge.
task_desc_texts: Light and defend the Deterrence Pylon

quests.title: Keys to Freedom
quests.description: Spymaster Bronn wants you to cause a distraction in Pirate's Stand by unleashing the encaged Ancient Guardians upon their jailers. With the enemy occupied, find the prison key and release the pirate captives to bolster our ranks.
task_desc_texts: Release the Captives in Sable Prison

quests.title: A Shocking Revelation
quests.description: Help Billiam Rowen with the discovery of his lifetime by defeating the Spectral Tyrant and ridding his cave of Lost! Return to Billiam in Cutlass Keys when you've finished.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the Cave of Tithing

quests.title: Whispers of Wealth
quests.description: A collector named Edwin Kasper is haunted by a voice that demands the recovery of artifacts lost among the shipwrecks of Cutlass Keys. Search for a golden beam to the south west and return the artifacts to satisfy the mysterious voice and save Kasper's sanity.
task_desc_texts: Complete the Quest Encounter "Endless Riches"\n(Search for the golden beam surrounding the marked location to find encounter)

quests.title: Soul Trap
quests.description: Rosina Bryce's search for supernatural rumors have led her to The Bloody Spike. Defeat warriors living and dead to collect enough Soul Gems for an offering, and see fortune bestowed by The Bloody Spike.
task_desc_texts: Defeat Warriors around The Bloody Spike
Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/focstrbonust4.webp::name=Soul Gem::drop=100%::rarity=common}}s from Warrior Spirits or Players
Offer Soul Gems to The Bloody Spike

quests.title: For Guts and Glory
quests.description: Get your hands dirty and defeat other fighters at the Citadel. Return to Decima Opimius when you have a story worth telling.

quests.title: Smell the Future
quests.description: Arnold Trost has discovered Lost are repulsed by man-sized sticks of burning incense. Venture into The Salty Marshes and light a Lost Deterrence Pylon to keep them out of Spyglass Ridge.
task_desc_texts: Light and defend the Deterrence Pylon

quests.title: Keys to Freedom
quests.description: Spymaster Bronn wants you to cause a distraction in Pirate's Stand by unleashing the encaged Ancient Guardians upon their jailers. With the enemy occupied, find the prison key and release the pirate captives to bolster our ranks.
task_desc_texts: Release the Captives in Sable Prison

quests.title: A Shocking Revelation
quests.description: Help Billiam Rowen with the discovery of his lifetime by defeating the Spectral Tyrant and ridding his cave of Lost! Return to Billiam in Cutlass Keys when you've finished.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the Cave of Tithing

quests.title: Whispers of Wealth

quests.title: When it Rains, it Pours
quests.description: The Mourningdale settlement has been struck by tragedy and is in disarray. Constable Bayles will fill you in.

quests.title: Ode to Aeternum
quests.description: Pierre Auguste would like new tales of Aeternum, but is too timid to travel himself. Write a collection of odes to the scenic locations described in Pierre's guidebook.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the first site in Pierre's Guidebook
Think up an ode inspired by the view
Travel to the second site in Pierre's Guidebook
Dream up a poem about the Ancients' aesthetic
Travel to the third site in Pierre's Guidebook
Concoct a tale of your valiant victories
Travel to the last site in Pierre's Guidebook
Consider a song about the journey

quests.title: Stone Cold Secrets
quests.description: Follow Leilani's clues, written on your map, to complete her last adventure and find three lost artifacts of Ancient construction.
task_desc_texts: Search Three Sites for Ancient Artifacts
Travel to the first site Leilani marked on your map
Investigate the location for Ancient artifacts
Travel to the second site Leilani marked on your map
Defeat the Bladedancer to recover an Ancient artifact
Travel to the third site Leilani marked on your map
Defeat Sunadire Ancients defending the site

quests.title: The Last Mystery
quests.description: Travel to three locations marked on your map and investigate whether Leilani's key can be used at each.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the first site marked on Leilani's map
Place the Artifact in the Impression
Travel to the second site marked on Leilani's map
Travel to the third site marked on Leilani's map
Return to Leilani with your stories

quests.title: A Toast to Adventure
quests.description: Bring Leilani's Special Order to the Bartender in the Mourningdale Tavern.

quests.title: Amateur Adventurer
quests.description: Follow the trail of clues to find where Pierre has gone.
task_desc_texts: Look for Pierre at the Soul Shrine to the far north
Find evidence of Pierre's passing through

quests.title: Song of the Sea
quests.description: Find the Captain's lost Shanty Book and Hurdy-Gurdy.
task_desc_texts: Retrieve Captain McKeys' Hurdy-Gurdy from ghosts in Smuggler's Cave

quests.title: Village Champion
quests.description: Recover Lerato's Heirloom armor and sword from the Corrupted in Ceremony and return them to her at the crossroads.
task_desc_texts: Head to the town of Ceremony
Search for Lerato's Heirloom Helmet in crates
Recover Lerato's Heirloom Breastplate from Corrupted
Retrieve Lerato's Family Sword from Corrupted

quests.title: Malign Dominion
quests.description: Find and destroy Malign Nodes at each of three Corrupt checkpoints along the road, then return to Harunobu at the crossroads. Some of these nodes are out of reach, you may need to bring a ranged weapon.
task_desc_texts: Search for Corruption Emitters at the first checkpoint
Search for Corruption Emitters at the second checkpoint
Search for Corruption Emitters at the final checkpoint

quests.title: Makin' Bacon
quests.description: Harvest Mourning Pigs in Hibbotsfeld for Harunobu and return them to him at the crossroads.

quests.title: Soul Music
quests.description: Clear away the Withered around the Ancient Head so that Jan Jaansen can better hear the mysterious voice.

quests.title: Following the Bard's Song
quests.description: Search the coastal roads for Jan Jaansen
task_desc_texts: Find Jan Jaansen along the north coast roads

quests.description: Get to the end of Presage Pier and look for inspiration for the next stanza of Jan's epic.
task_desc_texts: Observe the Ancient Lighthouse from the end of the Pier

quests.description: Follow Jan Jaansen's inspiration to the location foretold in Jan's inspiration.
task_desc_texts: Follow the route revealed by Jan Jaansen's muse
Continue along the route revealed by Jan Jaansen's muse
Go to the final location revealed by Jan Jaansen's muse

quests.title: Welcome to Mourningdale
quests.description: Find Harunobu, recently of Hibbotsfeld.

quests.title: The People in the Neighborhood
quests.description: Bring a sample of Harunobu's roast pork to Lerato.
task_desc_texts: Welcome Lerato to Mourningdale with a sample of Harunobu's roast pork.

quests.title: Seasoned Adventurer
quests.description: Race Pierre home to the Mourningdale Settlement
task_desc_texts: Race Pierre Home to Mourningdale Settlement.

quests.title: Flowers for the Heir
quests.description: The True Heir is returning to Monarch's Bluffs! Fiona Murphy has asked you to bring Avalon Lilies to Pendragon Landing as a tribute.
task_desc_texts: Go to Pendragon Landing, the place where Artorius first arrived
Gather Avalon Lilies for Artorius' True Heir
Place the Avalon Lilies on Pendragon Shrine

quests.title: The Anniversary Gift
quests.description: Edda Koning wants you to remind her husband, Eddie Koning it's their anniversary. Carry the message to Cynefin Mine.
task_desc_texts: Go to Cynefin Mine to look for Eddie Koning
Find the key to Edwyn's lockbox in Cynefin Mine
Open Edwyn's lockbox and check if there's a gift for Edda

quests.title: Pick of the Mines
quests.description: Prydwen is short on resources. Cemal, the Master Builder has asked you to retrieve the miners' picks so that he may melt them into iron.
task_desc_texts: Go to Cynefin Mine and look for the Miners

quests.title: Blow 'Em Down!
quests.description: Squire Ashe needs your help to blow up a bunch of pirates at Brysedd Shore.
task_desc_texts: Go to Traitor's Hold which is crawling with Pirates
Destroy the explosives and make the Pirates suffer

quests.title: A Wife's Mirror
quests.description: A wistful Hugo Molina has asked you to help him find the missing fragments of his Lost wife's mirror.

quests.title: The Maidens Lost
quests.description: Nabi has asked for evidence to prove getting married is not the answer to turning Lost. Hopefully, this will get her meddlesome marriage-minded mother off her back.
task_desc_texts: Go to Shatterwall once a territory of King Artorius
Collect Wedding Bands from Lost who were married once
Return the wedding bands and memoirs to Jeong Iseul in Preiddeu Farms
Show the evidence you've collected to Jeong Iseul
Craft a protective charm from the Lost wedding bands

quests.title: Dentistry Artistry
quests.description: Hamza Killic's brain is dancing with a new idea. Collect wolf fangs so that he may bring his invention to life!
task_desc_texts: Go to Silverclaw Cave, home of the wolves
Collect wolf fangs from the beasts that prowl here

quests.title: Heart of Glass
quests.description: A grieving Olivia Barovier has asked you to retrieve her Lost father's glassworks from Arruda Ranch.
task_desc_texts: Go to Arruda Ranch, Olivia Barovier's old home
Search Arruda Ranch for the glassworks and letters left behind by Olivia's father
Collect the glassworks made by Olivia's father
Collect the letters written by Olivia's father

quests.title: Ending the Madness
quests.description: Fixing the mirror for Hugo worsened matters. He needs your help breaking the large mirror at Deadman's Cove, so that he can finally let go of his Lost wife.
task_desc_texts: Go to Deadman's Cove to look for the scrying device
Destroy the Scrying Device to keep Fatimah from haunting Hugo
Defeat Fatimah Molina so that Hugo can finally let go

quests.title: A Useless Hope
quests.description: Dayo Musa's hopeful plan went horribly wrong. Retrieve the amulets from the Lost to put them at ease and return the amulets to him.
task_desc_texts: Collect the Protective Amulets Dayo had given these Lost

quests.title: The Aspiring Knight
quests.description: Ashe Dubois, Ser Payne's squire, has always longed to be a knight. Give her the proof that someone in her family used to be a knight once.

quests.title: Devil Honey
quests.description: Get combs of Devil's Honey from Geertie Lother's private reserve at Hiraeth Lookout and return them to her in Prydwen.
task_desc_texts: Go to Hiraeth Lookout to look for honey reserves
Collect Devil Honey for Geertie, the Prydwen barkeep

quests.title: Old World Wine
quests.description: Celebrate while you still can. Collect jars of Old World wine from Brysedd Shore and share them with Geertie Lother.
task_desc_texts: Collect bottles of Old World wine

Craft an iron longsword at the Forge
