quests.description: Right the wrongs done to the local wolf pack.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/wolf_den.webp::name=Fangsnap's Den::tid=60210}} to put down the tainted wolves

quests.title: Fisherman's Allure
quests.description: Search for treasure at Poseidon's Plunder for Wafa Keles.
task_desc_texts: Search the chest at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/shipwreck.webp::name=Poseidon's Plunder::tid=60226}} for treasure
Recover Poseidon's Goblet from the chest

quests.title: Treasured Company
quests.description: Bring a letter from Wafa Keles to Xue Tian

quests.title: Not Another Fish in the Sea
quests.description: Recover Xue's Sea Glass Charms from the Treetop pirates that stole them.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Treetop Terror::tid=60227}} to recover Xue's Sea Glass Charms

quests.title: Meat For Nekumanesh (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect Hunks of Meat for Nekumanesh the alligator from Corrupted Leaders in The Depths Expedition.
task_desc_texts: Venture into the Depths Expedition for Nekumanesh
Defeat Archdeacon Azamela and collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/meatt1.webp::name=Hunk of Meat::drop=100%::rarity=common}}

quests.title: Wispy Spritz Bombs
quests.description: The Bloom Herald offers to share the secret to true freedom if a rare blossom, the Wispy Bloom, can be safely collected.
task_desc_texts: Visit the Wispy Spritz Crafting Station in the Springtide Village and craft a Wispy Spritz bomb

quests.title: Springtide Bloom
quests.description: Armed with the Wispy Spritz bomb, the Bloom Herald has requested that the precious petals of the Wispyblooms be collected and brought to her in order to further the quest for harmony.

quests.title: The Missing Praetorians
quests.description: Captain Andrea Clermont has asked you to find her fellow Praetorians. If they've become Lost, help them find peace and bring back proof of their defeat.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=The Great Bazaar::tid=30304}} and search for the missing Praetorians
Defeat {{VC::name=Praetorian Jadzia Zajac::qty=1::named=1::id=Dune_Phantom_Berserker_Named_01::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Dune_Phantom_Berserker_Named_01}} and collect her Insignia.
Defeat {{VC::name=Praetorian Luca Brandt::qty=1::named=1::id=Dune_Phantom_Tank_Named_00::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Dune_Phantom_Tank_Named_00}} and collect his Insignia.
Defeat {{VC::name=Praetorian Simone Moreau::qty=1::named=1::id=Dune_Phantom_Berserker_Named_00::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Dune_Phantom_Berserker_Named_00}} and collect her Insignia.

quests.title: Personal Demons
quests.description: Discover if Praetorian Malatesta still lives. If he has become Lost, defeat him and retrieve his insignia
task_desc_texts: Search for Praetorian Malatesta in the ruins of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Neapolis::tid=30309}}
Defeat Praetorian Malatesta and Collect his Insignia.

quests.title: Duties Maintained
quests.description: Take Captain Clermont’s reports back to Prefect Severan in New Corsica.

quests.title: Roar of the Manticore
quests.description: Inside the Acropolis, investigate the threats that plague the trade route.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_citadel.webp::name=The Acropolis::tid=30303}} and investigate the rumors of a 'manticore'
Gather the Stinger of the 'Manticore' as evidence

quests.title: Audience with the Pontifex
quests.description: Prelate Razin has blocked you from speaking with Pontifex Charmion until you have gained an understanding of the True Gods, and the threat posed the Legion. Read the ‘Legacy of Rome’, then speak with the Prelate again.

quests.title: Power of the Gods
quests.description: Pontifex Charmion has requested that you seek out Pontiff Nuru in the Cradle of Nu and offer her aid.
task_desc_texts: Seek out Pontiff Nuru within the Cradle of Nu

quests.title: The Sleeping Vessels
quests.description: Search the wreckage for materials to craft Pontiff Nuru’s relic.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Serpent's Pass::tid=30404}} and search the wreckage for materials

quests.title: Gems of the Immortals
quests.description: Pontiff Nuru has asked you to defeat Anubian Automata and Constructs, and collect the gems they possess.
task_desc_texts: Defeat Anubian Automata and Constructs in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Visions of Nunut::tid=20404}}, and collect their gems for Pontiff Nuru
Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/diamondt4.webp::name=Attunement Gems::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from Anubian Automata and Constructs

quests.title: Awakening Anubis
quests.description: Pontiff Nuru has asked you to use the holy relic at the sarcophagus to awaken the Hand of Anubis.
task_desc_texts: Find and open the sealed sarcophagus in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Heru Plaza::tid=20403}}
Awaken the Ancient Idol with the use of the Blessed Relic

quests.title: Insufficient Faith
quests.description: Report Pontiff Nuru’s failure to awaken the Anubian vessels to Pontifex Charmion.

quests.title: Cursed Across Centuries
quests.description: Speak with Ariel Gideon about the plan to fight the 19th Legion, then find Tribune Kraus on the Scorched Battlefield.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the Scorched Battlefield to assist Alaina in the fight against the Legion

quests.title: Assault Against the Legion
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to defeat 19th Legion troops in their war camps.

quests.title: The Hydra's Breath
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to steal Hydra’s Breath from the 19th Legion to help destroy the enemy's siege weapons.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_legion_hq.webp::name=Castrum Pontem::tid=20302}} and search for Hydra's Breath, then eliminate the Legion's Alchemist

quests.title: A Blaze of Glory
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to destroy the 19th Legion's artillery and defeat Primus Vespasian.
task_desc_texts: Hunt down Primus Vespasian in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_legion_hq.webp::name=The Frontlines::tid=20301}}, then destroy the Legion's artillery

quests.title: The Last True Centurion
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to find and restore the New Corsican hero Evandrus.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/sulfer_pools.webp::name=New Thermopylae::tid=20315}} and search for the statue of Evandrus Crassus
Find and restore Evandrus using the Panacea

quests.title: A Legend Restored
quests.description: Inform the newly awakened Evandrus of the current invasion then report back to Tribune Kraus.
task_desc_texts: Report the news of Evandrus's return to Tribune Kraus.

quests.title: A Hero No More
quests.description: Inform Evandrus that Charmion commands him to return to New Corsica.
task_desc_texts: Find Evandrus in the Legion-controlled highlands

quests.title: Ultimate Intentions
quests.description: Evandrus has asked that you infiltrate the Corrupted Legion camp and steal their communications.
task_desc_texts: Infiltrate the Corrupted Legion camp at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Castellum Trismegistus::tid=20407}} and locate any correspondence
Search the camp for any vital correspondence

quests.title: Strength and Weakness
quests.description: Destroy the 19th Legion's supplies and slay Centurion Magnus.

quests.title: One Tribune at a Time
quests.description: In order to weaken Drusilla, you must take out her tribunes, one by one.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_legion_hq.webp::name=Castrum Victualis::tid=20305}} and seek out Tribune Ciara and Gladiatrix Ursula
Search for Tribune Elias in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Castellum Auxilia::tid=20316}}

Locate and defeat the twins, Castor and Pollux, in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_legion_hq.webp::name=Castrum Kerberos::tid=20304}}

quests.title: Head of the Snake
quests.description: Destroy the Legion’s command tents and defeat Prefect Drusilla.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Castellum Auxilia::tid=20316}} and burn the command tents of the Legion to draw out Drusilla, then defeat her
Ignite the Legion banner to draw out Drusilla

quests.title: Sic Transit Gloria Mundi
quests.description: Return to Charmion with news of your success against Drusilla's forces.
task_desc_texts: Return to New Corsica and tell Charmion of your success against the Legion

quests.title: Secrets in the Sands
quests.description: Speak to Pontiff Nuru at the Ancients' Rise and help her uncover the secrets of the Ennead.
task_desc_texts: Speak to Pontiff Nuru in the Ancients' Rise

quests.title: Miracles and Madness
quests.description: Recover Charmion’s journal and the Great Ennead Codex to reveal the secrets of Akhet.
task_desc_texts: Search for Charmion's Journal in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/abandoned_campsite.webp::name=Digsite Calamitous::tid=20411}}
Recover the pages of Charmion's Journal

Seek out the Great Ennead Codex Tablets along the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Atum's Way::tid=20401}}
Collect the Great Ennead Codex Tablets

quests.title: Hieratic Truth
quests.description: You must gather pieces of the Prime Key.
task_desc_texts: Return to the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Atum's Way::tid=20401}} and search for Prime Key Fragments

Retrieve Prime Key Fragments from enemies throughout {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_serpent.webp::name=Atum's Way::tid=20401}}

quests.title: The Key that was Broken
quests.description: Destroy the Lore Keeper and reforge the Prime Key.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_gate.webp::name=Forge of Ptah::tid=20410}} and defeat the Lore Keeper, then reforge the Prime Key
Collect the {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_shadowyprism.webp::name=Forge Ignition::drop=100%::rarity=common}} and use it to start the forge
Reforge the Prime Key with the Forge of Ptah

quests.title: Circles in Time
quests.description: Report what you have discovered about Akhet and the reforged Prime Key to Evandrus.
task_desc_texts: Return to Evandrus in New Corsica with the news of Akhet and the reforged Prime Key

quests.title: The Mighty Must Fall (Expedition)
quests.description: Evandrus has asked you to go to the Ennead and confront his father General Crassus.
task_desc_texts: Venture into the Ennead Expedition to confront General Crassus

quests.title: The Final Seal (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter the Pyramid of Akhet and seal the Ennead with the Prime Key to protect the people of Aeternum.
task_desc_texts: Venture into the Ennead Expedition to activate the Prime Key
Activate the Prime Key in the Ennead:
Confront whatever lurks in the heart of the temple
Activate the six Glyph Consoles throughout the Ennead
Insert the Prime Key in the Ancient Console

quests.title: Secret in the Desert
quests.description: With Apophis no longer a threat, Imhotep has turned his attention to matters closer to home. He has asked assistance in recovering a precious and mysterious parcel, buried long ago.
task_desc_texts: Search for the strange parcel buried at the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/desert_oasis.webp::name=Wadi el Sobek::tid=20310}}

quests.title: A Queen Revealed
quests.description: Ghazi's true identity has been revealed - Cleopatra VII Thea Philopater, Queen of Egypt! Her return would bring hope to the people of New Corsica, but Evandrus may have other ideas. Speak with him to determine his feelings.

quests.title: The Coronation
quests.description: With Evandrus's support, Cleopatra has consented to retake her position of power. Inform all of New Corsica of her return, then attend her coronation at the Royal Pavilion.
task_desc_texts: Inform the citizens of New Corsica of Cleopatra's return
Rendezvous with Ghazi and Imhotep at the Royal Pavilion
Observe the Coronation of New Corsica's ruler
Mingle with the notables of New Corsica

quests.title: Tremors in the Sand
quests.description: One of Imhotep's allies, Lysandra, has sent warning of strange events in the sands. Imhotep has asked you to seek her out and assist her in determining their cause.
task_desc_texts: Aid Lysandra in her investigation of the tremors
Return to the Library in New Corsica to warn Imhotep

quests.title: The Ancient Glyphs
quests.description: William Heron seeks an intrepid adventurer to search for Ancient Glyphs. Collect the glyph at the ruins of Satet, discover its purpose, and return to Heron in New Corsica.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_sm.webp::name=Satet::tid=30409}} in search of an Ancient Glyph
Use Your Azoth Staff to unseal the Glyph
Use the Ancient Glyph "EYBUE" to open the sealed chest at Satet
Study the Ancient Glyph "EYBUE" on the chest

quests.title: Scarab Secrets
quests.description: Eudoxia Dalassema needs someone willing to crack open Anubian Scarab Constructs and mine out the power sources within--preferably without alerting the authorities in New Corsica.
task_desc_texts: Visit the ruins of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_sm.webp::name=Khnum::tid=30410}} to study Scarab Constructs

quests.title: Lone Jackal
quests.description: Slay the jackals of Deadwater Den who attacked Senhyris, and find some medicine to treat her wounds.
task_desc_texts: Go east to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/wolf_den.webp::name=Deadwater Den::tid=30321}}, fight the jackals who attacked Senhyris, and find medicine to treat her wounds
Procure {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/mi_sealedflask.webp::name=Gnawed Health Potion::drop=100%::rarity=common}} to treat Senhyris' wounds

quests.title: Ruffled Feathers
quests.description: Nesse van Baten wants revenge on "Featherbane" the lion, who has developed an unfortunate taste for domestic poultry. Go to Two-Stones Grotto, then meet back up with Nesse at the nearby Outpost.
task_desc_texts: Travel southeast to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/cat_den.webp::name=Two-Stones Grotto::tid=30319}} and find Featherbane the Lion

quests.title: Aggressive Negotiations
quests.description: Huang Xiaoling is looking for a man who may have shipwrecked on the southern coast of Brimstone Sands. Search for any survivors at The Offering, then meet up with Xiaoling at Cavalier's Rest.
task_desc_texts: Travel to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/shipwreck.webp::name=The Offering::tid=30318}} in search of Ambassador Li

quests.title: Broken Pedestals
quests.description: Froderico Renaldi is beside himself after being murdered just outside Castrum Inferos. Recover the unfortunate historian's belongings from the Castrum, and return them to him.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_legion_hq.webp::name=Castrum Inferos::tid=20308}} for Froderico Renaldi's research notes
Search chests or fallen Sagittarii for Froderico's notes

quests.title: An Ancient Balancing Act
quests.description: Perrin Mercier discovered a tantalizing mystery in the collapsed Roman aqueduct, but can't climb it himself. Brave the treacherous ascent into the aqueduct, then return to Perrin with your findings.
task_desc_texts: Access the Aqueduct at {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_temple_lg.webp::name=Aqua Anuket::tid=30427}} to search for hidden secrets
Traverse the Top of the Aqueduct to the Oasis
Use Your Azoth Staff to unseal the Glyph

quests.title: Coming Forth by Day
quests.description: Acolyte Miresis seeks Egyptian funerary rites from his former mentor Psherenamun, who has become Lost. Seek out Psherenamun at Castrum Perdita, take the texts from him, and return to Saboteur's Hideaway.
task_desc_texts: Search for Psherenamun among the Lost
Collect the scroll of funerary rites

quests.title: The Insatiable Flame
quests.description: Bring delicious fish to the Insatiable Flame before he decides to make a snack out of you. You can catch fresh fish from any fishing hotspot in Brimstone Sands.
task_desc_texts: Catch an Extra-Tasty Fish in Brimstone Sands

quests.title: Artistic License
quests.description: Enez de Barros is convinced that there are dragon eggs at the Palace of Nekhbet. Search the reptile nests for eggs of any sort, and bring them back for Enez's inspection.

quests.title: Path of the Devourer
quests.description: Lysandra is distressed by strange tremors that have recently rocked the Great Pyramid of Akhet. Survey the area around the pyramid's base, and find evidence of what is causing the tremors.
task_desc_texts: Search the Pyramid's west side for clues

quests.title: The Antiquarian's Dream
quests.description: Emboldened by your success at the aqueduct, Perrin seeks your help to unlock the function of an Ancient stone gateway. Look for clues in the ruins of Hermopolis, then return to Perrin at the Great Shrine of Thoth.
task_desc_texts: Travel south to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_ancient_gate.webp::name=Hermopolis::tid=30403}} and search for any clues about unlocking the teleporter gates

Return to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/spirit_shrine_bg.webp::name=Great Shrine of Thoth::tid=30419}} and attempt to unlock the teleporter gateway located on the top level
Use Your Azoth Staff to unseal the Glyph at the Great Shrine
Unlock the teleporter gate at the Great Shrine of Thoth

quests.title: The Queen's Brood (Elite)
quests.description: The naturalist Tamouthis is concerned by the sudden and unnatural proliferation of massive scorpions in the Bubasteum. Venture into the Beds of Ta-Bitjet and slay the scorpion queen who lives there.
task_desc_texts: Enter the Beds of Ta-Bitjet, clear out egg clutches, and defeat the Scorpion Queen

quests.title: The Gods' Demand
quests.description: The priest Paubastis needs you to venture near the temple ruins of Henkhisesui, slay a lion, and bring back its heart. He promises good payment but refuses to explain why.
task_desc_texts: Use your Skinning Knife to remove the heart

quests.title: Flower of the Sands
quests.description: Collect Cactus Flowers in memory of Zahur's husband and bring them to him in the Camp.
task_desc_texts: Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/verbenat3.webp::name=Cactus Flower::drop=60%::rarity=common}} from Cacti in Brimstone Sands

quests.title: Sand Walkers
quests.description: Defeat the Sand Walkers in The Acropolis for Tahirah.
task_desc_texts: Enter the grounds of {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_citadel.webp::name=The Acropolis::tid=30303}} and destroy the Sand Walkers
Seach for and destroy Sand Walkers

quests.title: Honoring the 19th
quests.description: Confiscate Pickaxes from the Corrupted 19th, and recover their Legion Insignias for Acario Clemon.
task_desc_texts: Assault Crassus's Rise and Avenge the Honor of the 19th Legion

Confiscate {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/weapon/1hpickt1.webp::name=19th Legion Pickaxe::drop=100%::rarity=common}} from {{VC::name=Monument Miner::qty=4::named=0::id=Legion_Villager_Pickaxe_16BS02a::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/Legion_Villager_Pickaxe_16BS02a}} to stop the Monument to General Crassus

quests.title: On Duty, the Sun Never Sets
quests.description: Once Priestess of the Lamp of Osiris, Qabalah asks you to destroy the Ancient Guardians that contol the temple and retrieve the sacred Spark of Osiris from the Lamplighter. The Lamplighter ascends the ruins at day, but descends into a hidden chamber at night.
task_desc_texts: Enter the {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/ancient_lighthouse.webp::name=Lamp of Osiris::tid=30324}} and Destroy the Ancient Anubians

Search for and Defeat {{VC::name=Lamplighter Anedjti::qty=1::named=0::id=AnubianGuardian_Horus_Named_16BS02::url=https://nwdb.info/db/creature/AnubianGuardian_Horus_Named_16BS02}} to reclaim the sacred {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/corecrystalfiret5.webp::name=Spark of Osiris::drop=100%::rarity=common}}

quests.title: The Secret of the Baths
quests.description: Thermae Alchemist Clarisse Vesta has asked you to collect Embalming Salts from the sarcophagi in Jupiter's Grove for the Roman baths in New Corsica. Deliver them to Host Habibah in the city.
task_desc_texts: Search {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Jupiter's Grove::tid=30310}} for Salts to add to the Baths in New Corsica

Search Sarcophagi and Chests in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/brimstone/brimstone_roman_temple.webp::name=Jupiter's Grove::tid=30310}} to Collect {{ITEM::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/icons/items/resource/sandt3.webp::name=Embalming Salts::drop=100%::rarity=common}}

quests.title: Honor's End
quests.description: A Roman is searching for memoriabelia of his departed friends.

quests.title: A Warm Medleyfaire Welcome
quests.description: Welcome to Summer Medleyfaire! Interact with the Summer Deposit Boxes and collect the instruments placed around the Summer Village.
task_desc_texts: Collect Azoth Flute in Summer Village
Collect Upright Bass in Summer Village

quests.title: Maudlinbug Haze
quests.description: Travel to a Maudlinbug Swarmand perform the Maudlinbug Haze with a guitar equipped to collect Maudlinbug Bait and Maudlindust.
task_desc_texts: Open the Guitarist's Cache and learn the Maudlinbug Haze's Two Pages
Open Map (M) to search for Maudlinbug Swarm
Travel to the nearest Maudlinbug Swarm

quests.title: Sturgeon Song
quests.description: Catch an Aeternum Sturgeon in any open water source using Maudlinbugs as bait. Locate Aeternum Sturgeon Fishing Hotspotsfor an extra angling boost!
task_desc_texts: Use Maudlinbug Bait to catch Aeternum Sturgeon in any open water source or Aeternum Sturgeon Fishing Hotspot

quests.title: Stagecraft
quests.description: Mend the Carpenter's Bench for Susanne Weber to join the Medleyfaire.
task_desc_texts: Repair Carpentry Bench with green wood from your inventory

quests.title: Flower Power
quests.description: Water Flowers for Bak Ye-Jun to join the Medleyfaire.
task_desc_texts: Water Sunflowers with water from your inventory
Water Hibiscus with water from your inventory
Water Daisies with water from your inventory

quests.title: Bees in Bonnets
quests.description: Tend to Disturbed Apiraries for Luis Morales to join the Medleyfaire.
task_desc_texts: Craft the Bee Smoker recipe at your Camp

quests.title: Sweet Treats
quests.description: Clean the Baking Ovens so Mischa Balchunas can join the Medleyfaire.
task_desc_texts: Clean the Baking Oven with water from your inventory

task_desc_texts: Catch fish with weight greater than 30 pounds

task_desc_texts: Investigate Varangian treatment of the wolves

quests.title: The Silver Crows
quests.description: Grace O'Malley has developed a plan to found an enterprising new group of heroes who can work together to face the threats of Aeternum and possibly earn a little coin in the process.
task_desc_texts: Drive the Corrupted away from the outskirts of the Crow's Nest
Use your supplies to build the Crow's Nest

quests.description: The Silver Crows need more members. Work with Grace to find additional heroes to join the group.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Mourningdale to recruit new members for the Silver Crows
Post Silver Crows recruitment flyers in Grayvale Hamlet
Meet Grace O'Malley at the tavern to interview candidates for the Silver Crows

quests.title: Zander the Undying
quests.description: Grace has a great candidate in mind. Locate Zander the Undying and convince him to join the Crows.
task_desc_texts: Speak to Zander the Undying in Edengrove about joining the Silver Crows
Talk to Eynon the Druid about getting medicine for the baby lynx
Gather ingredients for Eynon's Purifying Pâté anti-toxin
Collect a Gator Liver from Black Alligators
Collect Verdant Essence from Angry Earth
Craft Eynon's Purifying Pâté at a Kitchen or at your Camp

quests.description: Help Zander find a way out of his organization.
task_desc_texts: Visit the Calvary church to investigate thefts
Ask the priest about the stolen funds
Store the fake funds in the cabinet
Find a good spot to watch for the thief
Confront Dicun about stealing the funds
Recover Granny's funds from Brightwood Isle so she'll let Zander join your team
Return the church renovation funds to Granny
Meet Zander at the Crow's Nest where he's gone to await Granny's answer

task_desc_texts: Enter the Empyrean Forge to find and stop Loth

task_desc_texts: Gather Gem from the Control Room

Meet Rima Bahar in the New Corsica tavern

Craft Zander's Lion Treat at a kitchen or in your camp
Go to the Bubasteum to find the Satyr's Flute
Go to the Ruined Seret to find the peacocks
Search near Henkhisesui for the Strange Jackal
Go to the Temple of Shu
Craft the Voices of the Desert Song at a workshop or at your camp

Talk to Rima Bahar in Jupiter's Grove
Play the Voices of the Desert on the Satyr Flute
Give Rima the Lute of Phoebus
Return to the Crow's Nest to talk to Grace

task_desc_texts: Enter the Trial of the Devourer

quests.title: Rise of the Hero
quests.description: Phaedra is still writing her epic, and wants to collect more notes to really make her story stand out. She has asked that I once again confront a Devourer and bring her the tales of my fight with it.
task_desc_texts: Enter the Trial of the Devourer

quests.title: A Cold Welcome
quests.description: Skye is reporting news of unusual Varangian activity in Great Cleave. Go to investigate and put a stop to their plans.
task_desc_texts: Enter the caves to find why Mordred was there
Make your way deeper into the caves
Discuss the strange ice dome and Mordred's ring with Skye
Visit Mordred's old cabin to find out what he's up to
Search Mordred's cabin for clues about his plans
Return to camp and tell Skye that Mordred is after the Frosted Crown of King Idris

quests.title: Daichi Saito
quests.description: Grace O'Malley wants to add more firepower to the team. Find Daichi Saito and recruit him to the Silver Crows.
task_desc_texts: Ask Rima about potential fire mage candidates
Find the fire mage Daichi Saito
Read the scroll for instructions on the Trapping Seal
Gather spirit wood, then build the Trapping Seals in any order
Construct the Trapping Seals in any order
Use the launchers to light the fire seals in the order depicted in Daichi's note
Let Daichi know the fires are lit
Use the war fan to enter Daichi's dojo
Return to the Crow's Nest and get Daichi settled in with the team
Check with Zander on how the Crows are getting along with Daichi

quests.title: The Ice Castle
quests.description: Work with Daichi Saito to find a way into the legendary Ice Castle, and look for the Frost Crown.
task_desc_texts: Get to the Island of Frost before Mordred does
Use a boat to reach the Island of Frost
Talk to Zander at the Frost Gate
Search for a way into the castle keep to find the Frost Crown
Defeat the Lost servants of King Idris for a key to his inner keep
Enter the inner keep to search for King Idris and the Frost Crown
Solve the chess endgame to win the exit gem
Recover the gem that fell from the King chess piece
Place the gem on the pedestal to unlock the door
Search the castle for King Idris and the Frost Crown
Ask Daichi if he can free the frozen prisoners
Talk to Skye about escorting the prisoners to safety
Enter the Throne Room to look for King Idris and the Frost Crown
Continue to search for the Frost Crown
Read the journal entry from King Idris
Return to the castle gate to let the others know that Mordred has the crown
Ask Morgaine what she's found about Mordred's plans

quests.title: The Mage
quests.description: Morgaine spoke of a mage who obtained the Staff of Samhain, the final artifact needed to empower Mordred and bring on an endless winter. Get the staff from the mage before Mordred does.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Ebonscale Reach to ask a Prydwen scholar for information that could curb Mordred's ambitions
Ask the scholar about the relationship between Artorius and Mordred
Read the journal entry from Artorius
Travel to the hills of Ebonscale Reach to look for Mordred and the Staff of Samhain
Ask Skye if she's seen Rima or Mordred
Look for an entrance into the caves to search for the Staff
Select the correct combination of door symbols to unlock the cavern entrance
Enter the inner caverns to search for the Staff
Continue your search for Mordred and the Staff of Samhain
See if Dog can do something about the door
Continue your search for the mage and the Staff of Samhain
Examine the map that Rima "borrowed" from Mordred
Talk to the head that appeared to the right of the doorway
Search Jehan's notes for the door's pass phrase
Tell the magic door the pass phrase and pursue Mordred
Defeat Jehan and find a way to reach the Staff of Samhain
Look for a way to reach Mordred and the Staff
Exit the caves to look for Mordred and the Staff
Return to camp to tell the others that Mordred has all three artifacts

quests.title: The Winter Rune
quests.description: Get the Winter Rune that binds the three winter artifacts together, before Mordred gets to it.
task_desc_texts: Travel to the Rune Forge to find the Winter Rune and forestall Mordred
Enter the Rune Forge and get the Winter Rune before Mordred does
Defeat the Forge Guardian to recover the Winter Rune
Look for the Winter Rune needed to thwart Mordred

quests.title: Eternal Frost
quests.description: Mordred has everything he needs to activate the Ancient device and become a winter demigod. Stop him before he brings about an Ice Age to Aeternum, and the rest of the world.
task_desc_texts: Travel to Mokosh Springs to stop Mordred from becoming a god
Reach the top of the mountain to find a path to the Ancient temple
Traverse the mountain to reach the Ancient temple where Mordred has gone
Find the waypoint to the Ancient temple where Mordred has gone
Read the note on the ground
Talk to Daichi about the journal note you found
Look for key runes needed to unseal the temple entrance
Use the telescope with Daichi's orb to capture the first key rune
Look for the second rune needed to unseal the temple
Collect the last key rune "Fear" needed to unseal the Ancient temple
Look for the entrance to the Ancient temple where Mordred has gone
Let Daichi know you have the runes needed to unlock the temple
Enter the temple to stop Mordred's transformation
Continue your search for Mordred and the ritual chamber
Orient the statues to unlock the ritual chamber door
Enter the ritual chamber and stop Mordred
Stop Mordred from bringing about an eternal winter
Tell Rima that you've stopped Mordred
Exit the caves and let Dog know you've defeated Mordred
Let Dog know you've defeated Mordred
Victory! Let the other Crows know you've averted Mordred's threat

quests.title: From Client to Crow
quests.description: Mordred has been stopped, and another crisis averted, for now. Share the news with his mother, Morgaine.
task_desc_texts: Go to Mordred's cabin in search of his mother, Morgaine

quests.title: The Glacial Tarn (Expedition)
quests.description: Shailyn has found another way into the underground caverns in Great Cleave. She wants you to pursue Ser Loth and destroy him.

quests.title: The Ice of Life (Expedition)
quests.description: The healer Ao Wei, is interested in the potential for curative powers of ice found in the Glacial Tarn in Great Cleave. He wants you to collect samples of any interesting ice formations that you find deep in the caverns.
task_desc_texts: Gather ice sample from Glacial Caverns
Gather ice sample from Promenade of Spring
Gather ice sample from Ascent of Seasons

quests.title: Hope and Service
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Florina has requested you aid Feldan save what you can at Olcott Farm and then meet her at the Church in Everfall.
task_desc_texts: Collect a Locket from one of the Lost
Bring the Family Memories to Feldan Olcott

quests.title: The Covenant Enclave
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Florina has asked you to visit her brother Lethold at the Covenant enclave in south-eastern Everfall. She has attuned your spirit with the shrine, so you may travel there safely.

quests.title: Justice and Courage
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Lethold beseeches you to rush to Clearview Crypt to end whatever terrible acts are transpiring, save Templar Damiano, and return to him at the Covenant Enclave.
task_desc_texts: Search for Evidence explaining how the Initiates became Corrupted

quests.title: The Lumen's Words
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Adjudicator Lethold has asked you to speak with Lumen Morellus at the Covenant Enclave for your final initiation test.

quests.title: Inspiration and Redemption
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Morellus has enlisted you to lure the Corrupted Templar back to Nettlerest Graveyard, best him in battle, collect his cursed necklace, and return to the Convenant Enclave.
task_desc_texts: Complete the Ritual and Reclaim the Corrupted Templar's Amulet

quests.title: Committing to the Cause
quests.description: Covenant Recruitment: You can now join the Covenant.
task_desc_texts: Pledge your allegiance to The Covenant
Speak with representative Beyza in the Covenant Enclave and, should you desire, join the Covenant.

quests.title: A First Step of Many
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Lieutenant Tibbs wants you to collect Lost Ears and a Knight's Signet ring at Lugdunum Fields for some sort of magic and then meet him at the ruin steps to the North of the farm.
task_desc_texts: Follow Tibb's instructions then meet him at the ruins
Collect a Signet Ring from a Lost Knight
Speak with Tibbs near the ruins

quests.title: Fortune Favors
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Lieutenant Tibbs has directed you to thrash some pirates and steal some black powder barrels at the Pirate Stockpile and then return to the Marauders Enclave.

quests.title: Threshold Guardian
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Lieutenant Tibbs has asked you to speak with Gladiator Strou'dahia at the Marauder Enclave for your final initiation test.

quests.title: Broken Bones and Blasted Bulwarks
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Gladiator Stroudahia has ordered you to best Varangians and rescue captives at Stonereach Keep. You must also complete Tibb's secret mission, before returning to the Marauders' Enclave
task_desc_texts: Plant Explosive at the Eastern Tower
Plant Explosive at the Western Tower

quests.title: One of Us
quests.description: Marauders Recruitment Quest: You can now join the Marauders.
task_desc_texts: Pledge your allegiance to The Marauders.
Speak with representative Smiggs in the Marauder Enclave and, should you desire, join the Marauders.

quests.title: Fickle Fusions, Fanged Folly
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Aventus has hired you to lure the altered wolves to Midnight Den and destroy them, then meet him at the Syndicate Enclave to the north-east when you are finished.
task_desc_texts: Destroy the wolves for Aventus, and meet him at the Enclave.
Defeat the Alpha Wolf and Pack (Optional: Place lure to draw the wolves)
Travel north east to the Enclave
Speak with Aventus at the Enclave

quests.title: Over the Cliffs, and Through the Woods
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Aventus has tasked you to climb the cliffs nearby into Brightwood and east into the grove of the Azoth Tree to collect water from the moat, and then return to him.
task_desc_texts: Sneak through Brightgrove and collect the Azoth-infused water.

quests.title: Woes of the Wise
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Aventus has asked you to speak with Cabalist Cleo Elsayad at the Syndicate Enclave for your final initiation test.

quests.title: Burden of Responsibility
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Cleo has requested that you travel to Broken Hull Hold, pour the sleeping draught into their wells, disrupt their reserves, and return to her at the Syndicate Enclave.
task_desc_texts: Sabotage the Broken Hull Hold water supply
Travel south east to Broken Hull Hold
Pour the draught into the Northern Well
Pour the draught into the Southern Well

quests.title: True Knowledge
quests.description: Syndicate Recruitment Quest: You can now join the Syndicate.
task_desc_texts: Pledge your allegiance to The Syndicate.
Speak with representative Astrid in the Syndicate Enclave and, should you desire, join the Syndicate.

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Gladiator
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Gladiator and then complete the Trial of the Gladiator quest from the Enclave.
task_desc_texts: Complete missions from the Faction Board, then report to the local Magistrate
Earn Faction Reputation to face the Trial for your next Rank
Complete the Trial of the Gladiator at the Enclave (Rec. Level: 25)

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Gladiator
quests.description: Defeat the Lost and their leader, Pirate Lawrence of the Long Shadow to prove you're worthy to advance to the rank of Gladiator. Talk to Commander Silas at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.
task_desc_texts: Defeat Lawrence of the Long Shadow and the Lost in {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/shipwreck.webp::name=Broken Hull Hold::tid=40207}} to earn the rank of Gladiator

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Ravager
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Ravager and then complete the Trial of the Ravager Quest from the Faction Representative in Weaver's Fen.
task_desc_texts: Earn Faction Reputation to face the Trial for your next Rank
Complete the Trial of the Ravager at the Enclave (Rec. Level: 35)

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Ravager
quests.description: Defeat a clan of bears in Greyvale Grotto to advance to the rank of Ravager. Talk to Commander Silas at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.
task_desc_texts: Go to {{POI::icon=https://cdn.nw-buddy.de/nw-data/live/lyshineui/images/map/icon/pois/bear_den.webp::name=Greyvale Grotto::tid=40346}} to defeat Grimclaw and his kin to Earn Rank of Ravager
Cut down {{VC::name=Bear_Black_02BW08::qty=5::named=0::id=::url=}} in the surrounding area
Defeat Grimclaw and take a Trophy

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Destroyer
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Destroyer and then complete the Trial of the Destroyer quest from the Faction Representative at the Enclave.
